Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::GLCanvas3D ( wxGLCanvas *  canvas,
Bed3D &  bed 
)
1396 : m_canvas(canvas)
1397 , m_context(nullptr)
1398 , m_bed(bed)
1399#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
1400 , m_retina_helper(nullptr)
1401#endif
1402 , m_in_render(false)
1403 , m_main_toolbar(GLToolbar::Normal, "Main")
1404 , m_undoredo_toolbar(GLToolbar::Normal, "Undo_Redo")
1405 , m_gizmos(*this)
1406 , m_use_clipping_planes(false)
1407 , m_sidebar_field("")
1408 , m_extra_frame_requested(false)
1409 , m_config(nullptr)
1410 , m_process(nullptr)
1411 , m_model(nullptr)
1412 , m_dirty(true)
1413 , m_initialized(false)
1414 , m_apply_zoom_to_volumes_filter(false)
1415 , m_picking_enabled(false)
1416 , m_moving_enabled(false)
1417 , m_dynamic_background_enabled(false)
1418 , m_multisample_allowed(false)

1421 , m_cursor_type(Standard)

1423 , m_render_sla_auxiliaries(true)
1424 , m_labels(*this)
1425 , m_slope(m_volumes)
1426 , m_sla_view(*this)
1427{

1429 m_timer.SetOwner(m_canvas);
1430 m_render_timer.SetOwner(m_canvas);

1432 m_retina_helper.reset(new RetinaHelper(canvas));
1433#endif // ENABLE_RETINA_GL
1434 }

◆ _check_and_update_toolbar_icon_scale()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_check_and_update_toolbar_icon_scale ( )
private
6278{
6279 // Don't update a toolbar scale, when we are on a Preview
6280 if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_preview_shown())
6281 return;
6282
6283 const float scale = wxGetApp().toolbar_icon_scale();
6284 const Size cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
6285
6286 int size = int(GLToolbar::Default_Icons_Size * scale);
6287
6288 // Set current size for all top toolbars. It will be used for next calculations
6289 GLToolbar& collapse_toolbar = wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar();
6290#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
6291 const float sc = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor() * scale;
6292 m_main_toolbar.set_scale(sc);
6293 m_undoredo_toolbar.set_scale(sc);
6294 collapse_toolbar.set_scale(sc);
6295 size *= int(m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor());
6296#else
6297 m_main_toolbar.set_icons_size(size);
6298 m_undoredo_toolbar.set_icons_size(size);
6299 collapse_toolbar.set_icons_size(size);
6300#endif // ENABLE_RETINA_GL
6301
6302 const float top_tb_width = m_main_toolbar.get_width() + m_undoredo_toolbar.get_width() + collapse_toolbar.get_width();
6303 int items_cnt = m_main_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt() + m_undoredo_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt() + collapse_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt();
6304 const float noitems_width = top_tb_width - float(size) * items_cnt; // width of separators and borders in top toolbars
6305
6306 // calculate scale needed for items in all top toolbars
6307 // the std::max() is there because on some Linux dialects/virtual machines this code is called when the canvas has not been properly initialized yet,
6308 // leading to negative values for the scale.
6309 // See: https://github.com/prusa3d/PrusaSlicer/issues/8563
6310 // https://github.com/supermerill/SuperSlicer/issues/854
6311 const float new_h_scale = std::max((cnv_size.get_width() - noitems_width), 1.0f) / (items_cnt * GLToolbar::Default_Icons_Size);
6312
6313 items_cnt = m_gizmos.get_selectable_icons_cnt() + 3; // +3 means a place for top and view toolbars and separators in gizmos toolbar
6314
6315 // calculate scale needed for items in the gizmos toolbar
6316 const float new_v_scale = cnv_size.get_height() / (items_cnt * GLGizmosManager::Default_Icons_Size);
6317
6318 // set minimum scale as a auto scale for the toolbars
6319 float new_scale = std::min(new_h_scale, new_v_scale);
6320#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
6321 new_scale /= m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
6322#endif
6323 if (fabs(new_scale - scale) > 0.01) // scale is changed by 1% and more
6324 wxGetApp().set_auto_toolbar_icon_scale(new_scale);
6325}
scale
int scale(const int val)

Definition GLCanvas3D.cpp:3990

7565 if (volume != nullptr && volume->is_outside)

◆ _load_print_object_toolpaths()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_print_object_toolpaths ( const PrintObject &  print_object,
const BuildVolume &  build_volume,
const std::vector< std::string > &  str_tool_colors,
const std::vector< CustomGCode::Item > &  color_print_values 
)
private
6885{
6886 std::vector<ColorRGBA> tool_colors;
6887 decode_colors(str_tool_colors, tool_colors);
6888
6889 struct Ctxt
6890 {
6891 const PrintInstances *shifted_copies;
6892 std::vector<const Layer*> layers;
6893 bool has_perimeters;
6894 bool has_infill;
6895 bool has_support;
6896 const std::vector<ColorRGBA>* tool_colors;
6897 bool is_single_material_print;
6898 int extruders_cnt;
6899 const std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>* color_print_values;
6900
6901 static ColorRGBA color_perimeters() { return ColorRGBA::YELLOW(); }
6902 static ColorRGBA color_infill() { return ColorRGBA::REDISH(); }
6903 static ColorRGBA color_support() { return ColorRGBA::GREENISH(); }
6904 static ColorRGBA color_pause_or_custom_code() { return ColorRGBA::GRAY(); }
6905
6906 // For cloring by a tool, return a parsed color.
6907 bool color_by_tool() const { return tool_colors != nullptr; }
6908 size_t number_tools() const { return color_by_tool() ? tool_colors->size() : 0; }
6909 const ColorRGBA& color_tool(size_t tool) const { return (*tool_colors)[tool]; }
6910
6911 // For coloring by a color_print(M600), return a parsed color.
6912 bool color_by_color_print() const { return color_print_values!=nullptr; }
6913 const size_t color_print_color_idx_by_layer_idx(const size_t layer_idx) const {
6914 const CustomGCode::Item value{layers[layer_idx]->print_z + EPSILON, CustomGCode::Custom, 0, ""};
6915 auto it = std::lower_bound(color_print_values->begin(), color_print_values->end(), value);
6916 return (it - color_print_values->begin()) % number_tools();
6917 }
6918
6919 const size_t color_print_color_idx_by_layer_idx_and_extruder(const size_t layer_idx, const int extruder) const
6920 {
6921 const coordf_t print_z = layers[layer_idx]->print_z;
6922
6923 auto it = std::find_if(color_print_values->begin(), color_print_values->end(),
6924 [print_z](const CustomGCode::Item& code)
6925 { return fabs(code.print_z - print_z) < EPSILON; });
6926 if (it != color_print_values->end()) {
6927 CustomGCode::Type type = it->type;
6928 // pause print or custom Gcode
6929 if (type == CustomGCode::PausePrint ||
6930 (type != CustomGCode::ColorChange && type != CustomGCode::ToolChange))
6931 return number_tools()-1; // last color item is a gray color for pause print or custom G-code
6932
6933 // change tool (extruder)
6934 if (type == CustomGCode::ToolChange)
6935 return get_color_idx_for_tool_change(it, extruder);
6936 // change color for current extruder
6937 if (type == CustomGCode::ColorChange) {
6938 int color_idx = get_color_idx_for_color_change(it, extruder);
6939 if (color_idx >= 0)
6940 return color_idx;
6941 }
6942 }
6943
6944 const CustomGCode::Item value{print_z + EPSILON, CustomGCode::Custom, 0, ""};
6945 it = std::lower_bound(color_print_values->begin(), color_print_values->end(), value);
6946 while (it != color_print_values->begin()) {
6947 --it;
6948 // change color for current extruder
6949 if (it->type == CustomGCode::ColorChange) {
6950 int color_idx = get_color_idx_for_color_change(it, extruder);
6951 if (color_idx >= 0)
6952 return color_idx;
6953 }
6954 // change tool (extruder)
6955 if (it->type == CustomGCode::ToolChange)
6956 return get_color_idx_for_tool_change(it, extruder);
6957 }
6958
6959 return std::min<int>(extruders_cnt - 1, std::max<int>(extruder - 1, 0));;
6960 }
6961
6962 private:
6963 int get_m600_color_idx(std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>::const_iterator it) const
6964 {
6965 int shift = 0;
6966 while (it != color_print_values->begin()) {
6967 --it;
6968 if (it->type == CustomGCode::ColorChange)
6969 shift++;
6970 }
6971 return extruders_cnt + shift;
6972 }
6973
6974 int get_color_idx_for_tool_change(std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>::const_iterator it, const int extruder) const
6975 {
6976 const int current_extruder = it->extruder == 0 ? extruder : it->extruder;
6977 if (number_tools() == size_t(extruders_cnt + 1)) // there is no one "M600"
6978 return std::min<int>(extruders_cnt - 1, std::max<int>(current_extruder - 1, 0));
6979
6980 auto it_n = it;
6981 while (it_n != color_print_values->begin()) {
6982 --it_n;
6983 if (it_n->type == CustomGCode::ColorChange && it_n->extruder == current_extruder)
6984 return get_m600_color_idx(it_n);
6985 }
6986
6987 return std::min<int>(extruders_cnt - 1, std::max<int>(current_extruder - 1, 0));
6988 }
6989
6990 int get_color_idx_for_color_change(std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>::const_iterator it, const int extruder) const
6991 {
6992 if (extruders_cnt == 1)
6993 return get_m600_color_idx(it);
6994
6995 auto it_n = it;
6996 bool is_tool_change = false;
6997 while (it_n != color_print_values->begin()) {
6998 --it_n;
6999 if (it_n->type == CustomGCode::ToolChange) {
7000 is_tool_change = true;
7001 if (it_n->extruder == it->extruder || (it_n->extruder == 0 && it->extruder == extruder))
7002 return get_m600_color_idx(it);
7003 break;
7004 }
7005 }
7006 if (!is_tool_change && it->extruder == extruder)
7007 return get_m600_color_idx(it);
7008
7009 return -1;
7010 }
7011
7012 } ctxt;
7013
7014 ctxt.has_perimeters = print_object.is_step_done(posPerimeters);
7015 ctxt.has_infill = print_object.is_step_done(posInfill);
7016 ctxt.has_support = print_object.is_step_done(posSupportMaterial);
7017 ctxt.tool_colors = tool_colors.empty() ? nullptr : &tool_colors;
7018 ctxt.color_print_values = color_print_values.empty() ? nullptr : &color_print_values;
7019 ctxt.is_single_material_print = this->fff_print()->extruders().size()==1;
7020 ctxt.extruders_cnt = wxGetApp().extruders_edited_cnt();
7021
7022 ctxt.shifted_copies = &print_object.instances();
7023
7024 // order layers by print_z
7025 {
7026 size_t nlayers = 0;
7027 if (ctxt.has_perimeters || ctxt.has_infill)
7028 nlayers = print_object.layers().size();
7029 if (ctxt.has_support)
7030 nlayers += print_object.support_layers().size();
7031 ctxt.layers.reserve(nlayers);
7032 }
7033 if (ctxt.has_perimeters || ctxt.has_infill)
7034 for (const Layer *layer : print_object.layers())
7035 ctxt.layers.emplace_back(layer);
7036 if (ctxt.has_support)
7037 for (const Layer *layer : print_object.support_layers())
7038 ctxt.layers.emplace_back(layer);
7039 std::sort(ctxt.layers.begin(), ctxt.layers.end(), [](const Layer *l1, const Layer *l2) { return l1->print_z < l2->print_z; });
7040
7041 // Maximum size of an allocation block: 32MB / sizeof(float)
7042 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading print object toolpaths in parallel - start" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
7043
7044 const bool is_selected_separate_extruder = m_selected_extruder > 0 && ctxt.color_by_color_print();
7045
7046 //FIXME Improve the heuristics for a grain size.
7047 size_t grain_size = std::max(ctxt.layers.size() / 16, size_t(1));
7048 tbb::spin_mutex new_volume_mutex;
7049 auto new_volume = [this, &new_volume_mutex](const ColorRGBA& color) {
7050 // Allocate the volume before locking.
7051 GLVolume *volume = new GLVolume(color);
7052 volume->is_extrusion_path = true;
7053 // to prevent sending data to gpu (in the main thread) while
7054 // editing the model geometry
7055 volume->model.disable_render();
7056 tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock;
7057 // Lock by ROII, so if the emplace_back() fails, the lock will be released.
7058 lock.acquire(new_volume_mutex);
7059 m_volumes.volumes.emplace_back(volume);
7060 lock.release();
7061 return volume;
7062 };
7063 const size_t volumes_cnt_initial = m_volumes.volumes.size();
7064 // Limit the number of threads as the code below does not scale well due to memory pressure.
7065 // (most of the time is spent in malloc / free / memmove)
7066 // Not using all the threads leaves some of the threads to G-code generator.
7067 tbb::task_arena limited_arena(std::min(tbb::this_task_arena::max_concurrency(), 4));
7068 limited_arena.execute([&ctxt, grain_size, &new_volume, is_selected_separate_extruder, this]{
7069 tbb::parallel_for(
7070 tbb::blocked_range<size_t>(0, ctxt.layers.size(), grain_size),
7071 [&ctxt, &new_volume, is_selected_separate_extruder, this](const tbb::blocked_range<size_t>& range) {
7072 GLVolumePtrs vols;
7073 std::vector<GLModel::Geometry> geometries;
7074 auto select_geometry = [&ctxt, &geometries](size_t layer_idx, int extruder, int feature) -> GLModel::Geometry& {
7075 return geometries[ctxt.color_by_color_print() ?
7076 ctxt.color_print_color_idx_by_layer_idx_and_extruder(layer_idx, extruder) :
7077 ctxt.color_by_tool() ?
7078 std::min<int>(ctxt.number_tools() - 1, std::max<int>(extruder - 1, 0)) :
7079 feature
7080 ];
7081 };
7082 if (ctxt.color_by_color_print() || ctxt.color_by_tool()) {
7083 for (size_t i = 0; i < ctxt.number_tools(); ++i) {
7084 vols.emplace_back(new_volume(ctxt.color_tool(i)));
7085 geometries.emplace_back(GLModel::Geometry());
7086 }
7087 }
7088 else {
7089 vols = { new_volume(ctxt.color_perimeters()), new_volume(ctxt.color_infill()), new_volume(ctxt.color_support()) };
7090 geometries = { GLModel::Geometry(), GLModel::Geometry(), GLModel::Geometry() };
7091 }
7092
7093 assert(vols.size() == geometries.size());
7094 for (GLModel::Geometry& g : geometries) {
7095 g.format = { GLModel::Geometry::EPrimitiveType::Triangles, GLModel::Geometry::EVertexLayout::P3N3 };
7096 }
7097 for (size_t idx_layer = range.begin(); idx_layer < range.end(); ++ idx_layer) {
7098 const Layer *layer = ctxt.layers[idx_layer];
7099
7100 if (is_selected_separate_extruder) {
7101 bool at_least_one_has_correct_extruder = false;
7102 for (const LayerRegion* layerm : layer->regions()) {
7103 if (layerm->slices().empty())
7104 continue;
7105 const PrintRegionConfig& cfg = layerm->region().config();
7106 if (cfg.perimeter_extruder.value == m_selected_extruder ||
7107 cfg.infill_extruder.value == m_selected_extruder ||
7108 cfg.solid_infill_extruder.value == m_selected_extruder ) {
7109 at_least_one_has_correct_extruder = true;
7110 break;
7111 }
7112 }
7113 if (!at_least_one_has_correct_extruder)
7114 continue;
7115 }
7116
7117 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
7118 GLVolume* vol = vols[i];
7119 if (vol->print_zs.empty() || vol->print_zs.back() != layer->print_z) {
7120 vol->print_zs.emplace_back(layer->print_z);
7121 vol->offsets.emplace_back(geometries[i].indices_count());
7122 }
7123 }
7124
7125 for (const PrintInstance &instance : *ctxt.shifted_copies) {
7126 const Point &copy = instance.shift;
7127 for (const LayerRegion *layerm : layer->regions()) {
7128 if (is_selected_separate_extruder) {
7129 const PrintRegionConfig& cfg = layerm->region().config();
7130 if (cfg.perimeter_extruder.value != m_selected_extruder ||
7131 cfg.infill_extruder.value != m_selected_extruder ||
7132 cfg.solid_infill_extruder.value != m_selected_extruder)
7133 continue;
7134 }
7135 if (ctxt.has_perimeters)
7136 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(layerm->perimeters(), float(layer->print_z), copy,
7137 select_geometry(idx_layer, layerm->region().config().perimeter_extruder.value, 0));
7138 if (ctxt.has_infill) {
7139 for (const ExtrusionEntity *ee : layerm->fills()) {
7140 // fill represents infill extrusions of a single island.
7141 const auto *fill = dynamic_cast<const ExtrusionEntityCollection*>(ee);
7142 if (! fill->entities.empty())
7143 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(*fill, float(layer->print_z), copy,
7144 select_geometry(idx_layer, fill->entities.front()->role().is_solid_infill() ?
7145 layerm->region().config().solid_infill_extruder :
7146 layerm->region().config().infill_extruder, 1));
7147 }
7148 }
7149 }
7150 if (ctxt.has_support) {
7151 const SupportLayer *support_layer = dynamic_cast<const SupportLayer*>(layer);
7152 if (support_layer) {
7153 for (const ExtrusionEntity *extrusion_entity : support_layer->support_fills.entities)
7154 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(extrusion_entity, float(layer->print_z), copy,
7155 select_geometry(idx_layer, (extrusion_entity->role() == ExtrusionRole::SupportMaterial) ?
7156 support_layer->object()->config().support_material_extruder :
7157 support_layer->object()->config().support_material_interface_extruder, 2));
7158 }
7159 }
7160 }
7161 // Ensure that no volume grows over the limits. If the volume is too large, allocate a new one.
7162 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
7163 GLVolume &vol = *vols[i];
7164 if (geometries[i].vertices_size_bytes() > MAX_VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE) {
7165 vol.model.init_from(std::move(geometries[i]));
7166 vols[i] = new_volume(vol.color);
7167 }
7168 }
7169 }
7170
7171 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
7172 if (!geometries[i].is_empty())
7173 vols[i]->model.init_from(std::move(geometries[i]));
7174 }
7175 });
7176 }); // task arena
7177
7178 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading print object toolpaths in parallel - finalizing results" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
7179 // Remove empty volumes from the newly added volumes.
7180 {
7181 for (auto ptr_it = m_volumes.volumes.begin() + volumes_cnt_initial; ptr_it != m_volumes.volumes.end(); ++ptr_it)
7182 if ((*ptr_it)->empty()) {
7183 delete *ptr_it;
7184 *ptr_it = nullptr;
7185 }
7186 m_volumes.volumes.erase(std::remove(m_volumes.volumes.begin() + volumes_cnt_initial, m_volumes.volumes.end(), nullptr), m_volumes.volumes.end());
7187 }
7188 for (size_t i = volumes_cnt_initial; i < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++i) {
7189 GLVolume* v = m_volumes.volumes[i];
7190 v->is_outside = !contains(build_volume, v->model);
7191 // We are done editinig the model, now it can be sent to gpu
7192 v->model.enable_render();
7193 }
7194
7195 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading print object toolpaths in parallel - end" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
7196}

static constexpr const size_t MAX_VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE

◆ _load_print_toolpaths()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_print_toolpaths ( const BuildVolume &  build_volume)
private
6827{
6828 const Print *print = this->fff_print();
6829 if (print == nullptr)
6830 return;
6831
6832 if (! print->is_step_done(psSkirtBrim))
6833 return;
6834
6835 if (!print->has_skirt() && !print->has_brim())
6836 return;
6837
6838 const ColorRGBA color = ColorRGBA::GREENISH();
6839
6840 // number of skirt layers
6841 size_t total_layer_count = 0;
6842 for (const PrintObject* print_object : print->objects()) {
6843 total_layer_count = std::max(total_layer_count, print_object->total_layer_count());
6844 }
6845 size_t skirt_height = print->has_infinite_skirt() ? total_layer_count : std::min<size_t>(print->config().skirt_height.value, total_layer_count);
6846 if (skirt_height == 0 && print->has_brim())
6847 skirt_height = 1;
6848
6849 // Get first skirt_height layers.
6850 //FIXME This code is fishy. It may not work for multiple objects with different layering due to variable layer height feature.
6851 // This is not critical as this is just an initial preview.
6852 const PrintObject* highest_object = *std::max_element(print->objects().begin(), print->objects().end(), [](auto l, auto r){ return l->layers().size() < r->layers().size(); });
6853 std::vector<float> print_zs;
6854 print_zs.reserve(skirt_height * 2);
6855 for (size_t i = 0; i < std::min(skirt_height, highest_object->layers().size()); ++ i)
6856 print_zs.emplace_back(float(highest_object->layers()[i]->print_z));
6857 // Only add skirt for the raft layers.
6858 for (size_t i = 0; i < std::min(skirt_height, std::min(highest_object->slicing_parameters().raft_layers(), highest_object->support_layers().size())); ++ i)
6859 print_zs.emplace_back(float(highest_object->support_layers()[i]->print_z));
6860 sort_remove_duplicates(print_zs);
6861 skirt_height = std::min(skirt_height, print_zs.size());
6862 print_zs.erase(print_zs.begin() + skirt_height, print_zs.end());
6863
6864 GLVolume* volume = m_volumes.new_toolpath_volume(color);
6865 GLModel::Geometry init_data;
6866 init_data.format = { GLModel::Geometry::EPrimitiveType::Triangles, GLModel::Geometry::EVertexLayout::P3N3 };
6867 for (size_t i = 0; i < skirt_height; ++ i) {
6868 volume->print_zs.emplace_back(print_zs[i]);
6869 volume->offsets.emplace_back(init_data.indices_count());
6870 if (i == 0)
6871 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(print->brim(), print_zs[i], Point(0, 0), init_data);
6872 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(print->skirt(), print_zs[i], Point(0, 0), init_data);
6873 // Ensure that no volume grows over the limits. If the volume is too large, allocate a new one.
6874 if (init_data.vertices_size_bytes() > MAX_VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE) {
6875 volume->model.init_from(std::move(init_data));
6876 GLVolume &vol = *volume;
6877 volume = m_volumes.new_toolpath_volume(vol.color);
6878 }
6879 }
6880 volume->model.init_from(std::move(init_data));
6881 volume->is_outside = !contains(build_volume, volume->model);
6882}

◆ _load_sla_shells()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_sla_shells ( )
private
7384{
7385 const SLAPrint* print = this->sla_print();
7386 if (print->objects().empty())
7387 // nothing to render, return
7388 return;
7389
7390 auto add_volume = [this](const SLAPrintObject &object, int volume_id, const SLAPrintObject::Instance& instance,
7391 const indexed_triangle_set& mesh, const ColorRGBA& color, bool outside_printer_detection_enabled) {
7392 m_volumes.volumes.emplace_back(new GLVolume(color));
7393 GLVolume& v = *m_volumes.volumes.back();
7394#if ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
7395 v.model.init_from(mesh, true);
7396#else
7397 v.model.init_from(mesh);
7398#endif // ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
7399 v.shader_outside_printer_detection_enabled = outside_printer_detection_enabled;
7400 v.composite_id.volume_id = volume_id;
7401 v.set_instance_offset(unscale(instance.shift.x(), instance.shift.y(), 0.0));
7402 v.set_instance_rotation({ 0.0, 0.0, (double)instance.rotation });
7403 v.set_instance_mirror(X, object.is_left_handed() ? -1. : 1.);
7404 v.set_convex_hull(TriangleMesh{its_convex_hull(mesh)});
7405 };
7406
7407 // adds objects' volumes
7408 for (const SLAPrintObject* obj : print->objects()) {
7409 unsigned int initial_volumes_count = (unsigned int)m_volumes.volumes.size();
7410 std::shared_ptr<const indexed_triangle_set> m = obj->get_mesh_to_print();
7411 if (m && !m->empty()) {
7412 for (const SLAPrintObject::Instance& instance : obj->instances()) {
7413 add_volume(*obj, 0, instance, *m, GLVolume::MODEL_COLOR[0], true);
7414 // Set the extruder_id and volume_id to achieve the same color as in the 3D scene when
7415 // through the update_volumes_colors_by_extruder() call.
7416 m_volumes.volumes.back()->extruder_id = obj->model_object()->volumes.front()->extruder_id();
7417 if (auto &tree_mesh = obj->support_mesh().its; !tree_mesh.empty())
7418 add_volume(*obj, -int(slaposSupportTree), instance, tree_mesh, GLVolume::SLA_SUPPORT_COLOR, true);
7419 if (auto &pad_mesh = obj->pad_mesh().its; !pad_mesh.empty())
7420 add_volume(*obj, -int(slaposPad), instance, pad_mesh, GLVolume::SLA_PAD_COLOR, false);
7421 }
7422 }
7423 const double shift_z = obj->get_current_elevation();
7424 for (unsigned int i = initial_volumes_count; i < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++ i) {
7425 // apply shift z
7426 m_volumes.volumes[i]->set_sla_shift_z(shift_z);
7427 }
7428 }
7429
7430 update_volumes_colors_by_extruder();
7431}

◆ _load_wipe_tower_toolpaths()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_wipe_tower_toolpaths ( const BuildVolume &  build_volume,
const std::vector< std::string > &  str_tool_colors 
)
private
7199{
7200 const Print *print = this->fff_print();
7201 if (print == nullptr || print->wipe_tower_data().tool_changes.empty())
7202 return;
7203
7204 if (!print->is_step_done(psWipeTower))
7205 return;
7206
7207 std::vector<ColorRGBA> tool_colors;
7208 decode_colors(str_tool_colors, tool_colors);
7209
7210 struct Ctxt
7211 {
7212 const Print *print;
7213 const std::vector<ColorRGBA> *tool_colors;
7214 Vec2f wipe_tower_pos;
7215 float wipe_tower_angle;
7216
7217 static ColorRGBA color_support() { return ColorRGBA::GREENISH(); }
7218
7219 // For cloring by a tool, return a parsed color.
7220 bool color_by_tool() const { return tool_colors != nullptr; }
7221 size_t number_tools() const { return this->color_by_tool() ? tool_colors->size() : 0; }
7222 const ColorRGBA& color_tool(size_t tool) const { return (*tool_colors)[tool]; }
7223 int volume_idx(int tool, int feature) const {
7224 return this->color_by_tool() ? std::min<int>(this->number_tools() - 1, std::max<int>(tool, 0)) : feature;
7225 }
7226
7227 const std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult>& tool_change(size_t idx) {
7228 const auto &tool_changes = print->wipe_tower_data().tool_changes;
7229 return priming.empty() ?
7230 ((idx == tool_changes.size()) ? final : tool_changes[idx]) :
7231 ((idx == 0) ? priming : (idx == tool_changes.size() + 1) ? final : tool_changes[idx - 1]);
7232 }
7233 std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult> priming;
7234 std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult> final;
7235 } ctxt;
7236
7237 ctxt.print = print;
7238 ctxt.tool_colors = tool_colors.empty() ? nullptr : &tool_colors;
7239 if (print->wipe_tower_data().priming && print->config().single_extruder_multi_material_priming)
7240 for (int i=0; i<(int)print->wipe_tower_data().priming.get()->size(); ++i)
7241 ctxt.priming.emplace_back(print->wipe_tower_data().priming.get()->at(i));
7242 if (print->wipe_tower_data().final_purge)
7243 ctxt.final.emplace_back(*print->wipe_tower_data().final_purge.get());
7244
7245 ctxt.wipe_tower_angle = ctxt.print->config().wipe_tower_rotation_angle.value/180.f * PI;
7246 ctxt.wipe_tower_pos = Vec2f(ctxt.print->config().wipe_tower_x.value, ctxt.print->config().wipe_tower_y.value);
7247
7248 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading wipe tower toolpaths in parallel - start" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
7249
7250 //FIXME Improve the heuristics for a grain size.
7251 size_t n_items = print->wipe_tower_data().tool_changes.size() + (ctxt.priming.empty() ? 0 : 1);
7252 size_t grain_size = std::max(n_items / 128, size_t(1));
7253 tbb::spin_mutex new_volume_mutex;
7254 auto new_volume = [this, &new_volume_mutex](const ColorRGBA& color) {
7255 auto *volume = new GLVolume(color);
7256 volume->is_extrusion_path = true;
7257 // to prevent sending data to gpu (in the main thread) while
7258 // editing the model geometry
7259 volume->model.disable_render();
7260 tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock;
7261 lock.acquire(new_volume_mutex);
7262 m_volumes.volumes.emplace_back(volume);
7263 lock.release();
7264 return volume;
7265 };
7266 const size_t volumes_cnt_initial = m_volumes.volumes.size();
7267 std::vector<GLVolumeCollection> volumes_per_thread(n_items);
7268 tbb::parallel_for(
7269 tbb::blocked_range<size_t>(0, n_items, grain_size),
7270 [&ctxt, &new_volume](const tbb::blocked_range<size_t>& range) {
7271 // Bounding box of this slab of a wipe tower.
7272 GLVolumePtrs vols;
7273 std::vector<GLModel::Geometry> geometries;
7274 if (ctxt.color_by_tool()) {
7275 for (size_t i = 0; i < ctxt.number_tools(); ++i) {
7276 vols.emplace_back(new_volume(ctxt.color_tool(i)));
7277 geometries.emplace_back(GLModel::Geometry());
7278 }
7279 }
7280 else {
7281 vols = { new_volume(ctxt.color_support()) };
7282 geometries = { GLModel::Geometry() };
7283 }
7284
7285 assert(vols.size() == geometries.size());
7286 for (GLModel::Geometry& g : geometries) {
7287 g.format = { GLModel::Geometry::EPrimitiveType::Triangles, GLModel::Geometry::EVertexLayout::P3N3 };
7288 }
7289 for (size_t idx_layer = range.begin(); idx_layer < range.end(); ++idx_layer) {
7290 const std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult> &layer = ctxt.tool_change(idx_layer);
7291 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
7292 GLVolume &vol = *vols[i];
7293 if (vol.print_zs.empty() || vol.print_zs.back() != layer.front().print_z) {
7294 vol.print_zs.emplace_back(layer.front().print_z);
7295 vol.offsets.emplace_back(geometries[i].indices_count());
7296 }
7297 }
7298 for (const WipeTower::ToolChangeResult &extrusions : layer) {
7299 for (size_t i = 1; i < extrusions.extrusions.size();) {
7300 const WipeTower::Extrusion &e = extrusions.extrusions[i];
7301 if (e.width == 0.) {
7302 ++i;
7303 continue;
7304 }
7305 size_t j = i + 1;
7306 if (ctxt.color_by_tool())
7307 for (; j < extrusions.extrusions.size() && extrusions.extrusions[j].tool == e.tool && extrusions.extrusions[j].width > 0.f; ++j);
7308 else
7309 for (; j < extrusions.extrusions.size() && extrusions.extrusions[j].width > 0.f; ++j);
7310 size_t n_lines = j - i;
7311 Lines lines;
7312 std::vector<double> widths;
7313 std::vector<double> heights;
7314 lines.reserve(n_lines);
7315 widths.reserve(n_lines);
7316 heights.assign(n_lines, extrusions.layer_height);
7317 WipeTower::Extrusion e_prev = extrusions.extrusions[i-1];
7318
7319 if (!extrusions.priming) { // wipe tower extrusions describe the wipe tower at the origin with no rotation
7320 e_prev.pos = Eigen::Rotation2Df(ctxt.wipe_tower_angle) * e_prev.pos;
7321 e_prev.pos += ctxt.wipe_tower_pos;
7322 }
7323
7324 for (; i < j; ++i) {
7325 WipeTower::Extrusion e = extrusions.extrusions[i];
7326 assert(e.width > 0.f);
7327 if (!extrusions.priming) {
7328 e.pos = Eigen::Rotation2Df(ctxt.wipe_tower_angle) * e.pos;
7329 e.pos += ctxt.wipe_tower_pos;
7330 }
7331
7332 lines.emplace_back(Point::new_scale(e_prev.pos.x(), e_prev.pos.y()), Point::new_scale(e.pos.x(), e.pos.y()));
7333 widths.emplace_back(e.width);
7334
7335 e_prev = e;
7336 }
7337
7338 _3DScene::thick_lines_to_verts(lines, widths, heights, lines.front().a == lines.back().b, extrusions.print_z,
7339 geometries[ctxt.volume_idx(e.tool, 0)]);
7340 }
7341 }
7342 }
7343 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
7344 GLVolume &vol = *vols[i];
7345 if (geometries[i].vertices_size_bytes() > MAX_VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE) {
7346 vol.model.init_from(std::move(geometries[i]));
7347 vols[i] = new_volume(vol.color);
7348 }
7349 }
7350
7351 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
7352 if (!geometries[i].is_empty())
7353 vols[i]->model.init_from(std::move(geometries[i]));
7354 }
7355 });
7356
7357 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading wipe tower toolpaths in parallel - finalizing results" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
7358 // Remove empty volumes from the newly added volumes.
7359 {
7360 for (auto ptr_it = m_volumes.volumes.begin() + volumes_cnt_initial; ptr_it != m_volumes.volumes.end(); ++ptr_it)
7361 if ((*ptr_it)->empty()) {
7362 delete *ptr_it;
7363 *ptr_it = nullptr;
7364 }
7365 m_volumes.volumes.erase(std::remove(m_volumes.volumes.begin() + volumes_cnt_initial, m_volumes.volumes.end(), nullptr), m_volumes.volumes.end());
7366 }
7367 for (size_t i = volumes_cnt_initial; i < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++i) {
7368 GLVolume* v = m_volumes.volumes[i];
7369 v->is_outside = !contains(build_volume, v->model);
7370 // We are done editinig the model, now it can be sent to gpu
7371 v->model.enable_render();
7372 }
7373
7374 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading wipe tower toolpaths in parallel - end" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
7375}
Eigen::Rotation2Df
Rotation2D< float > Rotation2Df
Definition Rotation2D.h:165

Definition 3DScene.cpp:1417

◆ _max_bounding_box()

BoundingBoxf3 Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_max_bounding_box ( bool  include_gizmos,
bool  include_bed_model 
) const
private
5641{
5642 BoundingBoxf3 bb = volumes_bounding_box();
5643
5644 // The following is a workaround for gizmos not being taken in account when calculating the tight camera frustrum
5645 // A better solution would ask the gizmo manager for the bounding box of the current active gizmo, if any
5646 if (include_gizmos && m_gizmos.is_running()) {
5647 const BoundingBoxf3 sel_bb = m_selection.get_bounding_box();
5648 const Vec3d sel_bb_center = sel_bb.center();
5649 const Vec3d extend_by = sel_bb.max_size() * Vec3d::Ones();
5650 bb.merge(BoundingBoxf3(sel_bb_center - extend_by, sel_bb_center + extend_by));
5651 }
5652
5653 const BoundingBoxf3 bed_bb = include_bed_model ? m_bed.extended_bounding_box() : m_bed.build_volume().bounding_volume();
5654 bb.merge(bed_bb);
5655
5656 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled())
5657 bb.merge(m_gcode_viewer.get_max_bounding_box());
5658
5659 // clamp max bb size with respect to bed bb size
5660 if (!m_picking_enabled) {
5661 static const double max_scale_factor = 2.0;
5662 const Vec3d bb_size = bb.size();
5663 const Vec3d bed_bb_size = m_bed.build_volume().bounding_volume().size();
5664
5665 if ((bed_bb_size.x() > 0.0 && bb_size.x() > max_scale_factor * bed_bb_size.x()) ||
5666 (bed_bb_size.y() > 0.0 && bb_size.y() > max_scale_factor * bed_bb_size.y()) ||
5667 (bed_bb_size.z() > 0.0 && bb_size.z() > max_scale_factor * bed_bb_size.z())) {
5668 const Vec3d bed_bb_center = bed_bb.center();
5669 const Vec3d extend_by = max_scale_factor * bed_bb_size;
5670 bb = BoundingBoxf3(bed_bb_center - extend_by, bed_bb_center + extend_by);
5671 }
5672 }
5673
5674 return bb;
5675}

6812 const Linef3 ray = mouse_ray(mouse_pos);
6813 return (std::abs(ray.unit_vector().z()) < EPSILON) ? ray.a : ray.intersect_plane(0.0);

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_perform_layer_editing_action ( wxMouseEvent *  evt = nullptr)

6768{
6769 int object_idx_selected = m_layers_editing.last_object_id;
6770 if (object_idx_selected == -1)
6771 return;
6772
6773 // A volume is selected. Test, whether hovering over a layer thickness bar.
6774 if (evt != nullptr) {
6775 const Rect& rect = LayersEditing::get_bar_rect_screen(*this);
6776 float b = rect.get_bottom();
6777 m_layers_editing.last_z = m_layers_editing.object_max_z() * (b - evt->GetY() - 1.0f) / (b - rect.get_top());
6778 m_layers_editing.last_action =
6779 evt->ShiftDown() ? (evt->RightIsDown() ? LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_SMOOTH : LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_REDUCE) :
6780 (evt->RightIsDown() ? LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_INCREASE : LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_DECREASE);
6781 }
6782
6783 if (m_layers_editing.state != LayersEditing::Paused) {
6784 m_layers_editing.adjust_layer_height_profile();
6785 _refresh_if_shown_on_screen();
6786 }
6787
6788 // Automatic action on mouse down with the same coordinate.
6789 _start_timer();
6790}

◆ _picking_pass()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_picking_pass ( )
private
5712{
5713 if (!m_picking_enabled || m_mouse.dragging || m_mouse.position == Vec2d(DBL_MAX, DBL_MAX) || m_gizmos.is_dragging()) {
5714#if ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
5715 ImGuiWrapper& imgui = *wxGetApp().imgui();
5716 imgui.begin(std::string("Hit result"), ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize);
5717 imgui.text("Picking disabled");
5718 imgui.end();
5719#endif // ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
5720 return;
5721 }
5722
5723 m_hover_volume_idxs.clear();
5724
5725 const ClippingPlane clipping_plane = m_gizmos.get_clipping_plane().inverted_normal();
5726 const SceneRaycaster::HitResult hit = m_scene_raycaster.hit(m_mouse.position, wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera(), &clipping_plane);
5727 if (hit.is_valid()) {
5728 switch (hit.type)
5729 {
5730 case SceneRaycaster::EType::Volume:
5731 {
5732 if (0 <= hit.raycaster_id && hit.raycaster_id < (int)m_volumes.volumes.size()) {
5733 const GLVolume* volume = m_volumes.volumes[hit.raycaster_id];
5734 if (volume->is_active && !volume->disabled && (volume->composite_id.volume_id >= 0 || m_render_sla_auxiliaries)) {
5735 // do not add the volume id if any gizmo is active and CTRL is pressed
5736 if (m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::EType::Undefined || !wxGetKeyState(WXK_CONTROL))
5737 m_hover_volume_idxs.emplace_back(hit.raycaster_id);
5738 m_gizmos.set_hover_id(-1);
5739 }
5740 }
5741 else
5742 assert(false);
5743
5744 break;
5745 }
5746 case SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo:
5747 {
5748 const Size& cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
5749 const bool inside = 0 <= m_mouse.position.x() && m_mouse.position.x() < cnv_size.get_width() &&
5750 0 <= m_mouse.position.y() && m_mouse.position.y() < cnv_size.get_height();
5751 m_gizmos.set_hover_id(inside ? hit.raycaster_id : -1);
5752 break;
5753 }
5754 case SceneRaycaster::EType::Bed:
5755 {
5756 m_gizmos.set_hover_id(-1);
5757 break;
5758 }
5759 default:
5760 {
5761 assert(false);
5762 break;
5763 }
5764 }
5765 }
5766 else
5767 m_gizmos.set_hover_id(-1);
5768
5769 _update_volumes_hover_state();
5770
5771#if ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
5772 ImGuiWrapper& imgui = *wxGetApp().imgui();
5773 imgui.begin(std::string("Hit result"), ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize);
5774 std::string object_type = "None";
5775 switch (hit.type)
5776 {
5777 case SceneRaycaster::EType::Bed: { object_type = "Bed"; break; }
5778 case SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo: { object_type = "Gizmo element"; break; }
5779 case SceneRaycaster::EType::Volume:
5780 {
5781 if (m_volumes.volumes[hit.raycaster_id]->is_wipe_tower)
5782 object_type = "Volume (Wipe tower)";
5783 else if (m_volumes.volumes[hit.raycaster_id]->volume_idx() == -int(slaposPad))
5784 object_type = "Volume (SLA pad)";
5785 else if (m_volumes.volumes[hit.raycaster_id]->volume_idx() == -int(slaposSupportTree))
5786 object_type = "Volume (SLA supports)";
5787 else if (m_volumes.volumes[hit.raycaster_id]->is_modifier)
5788 object_type = "Volume (Modifier)";
5789 else
5790 object_type = "Volume (Part)";
5791 break;
5792 }
5793 default: { break; }
5794 }
5795
5796 auto add_strings_row_to_table = [&imgui](const std::string& col_1, const ImVec4& col_1_color, const std::string& col_2, const ImVec4& col_2_color,
5797 const std::string& col_3 = "", const ImVec4& col_3_color = ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text)) {
5798 ImGui::TableNextRow();
5799 ImGui::TableSetColumnIndex(0);
5800 imgui.text_colored(col_1_color, col_1.c_str());
5801 ImGui::TableSetColumnIndex(1);
5802 imgui.text_colored(col_2_color, col_2.c_str());
5803 if (!col_3.empty()) {
5804 ImGui::TableSetColumnIndex(2);
5805 imgui.text_colored(col_3_color, col_3.c_str());
5806 }
5807 };
5808
5809 char buf[1024];
5810 if (hit.type != SceneRaycaster::EType::None) {
5811 if (ImGui::BeginTable("Hit", 2)) {
5812 add_strings_row_to_table("Object ID", ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT, std::to_string(hit.raycaster_id), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5813 add_strings_row_to_table("Type", ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT, object_type, ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5814 sprintf(buf, "%.3f, %.3f, %.3f", hit.position.x(), hit.position.y(), hit.position.z());
5815 add_strings_row_to_table("Position", ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT, std::string(buf), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5816 sprintf(buf, "%.3f, %.3f, %.3f", hit.normal.x(), hit.normal.y(), hit.normal.z());
5817 add_strings_row_to_table("Normal", ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT, std::string(buf), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5818 ImGui::EndTable();
5819 }
5820 }
5821 else
5822 imgui.text("NO HIT");
5823
5824 ImGui::Separator();
5825 imgui.text("Registered for picking:");
5826 if (ImGui::BeginTable("Raycasters", 2)) {
5827 sprintf(buf, "%d (%d)", (int)m_scene_raycaster.beds_count(), (int)m_scene_raycaster.active_beds_count());
5828 add_strings_row_to_table("Beds", ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT, std::string(buf), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5829 sprintf(buf, "%d (%d)", (int)m_scene_raycaster.volumes_count(), (int)m_scene_raycaster.active_volumes_count());
5830 add_strings_row_to_table("Volumes", ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT, std::string(buf), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5831 sprintf(buf, "%d (%d)", (int)m_scene_raycaster.gizmos_count(), (int)m_scene_raycaster.active_gizmos_count());
5832 add_strings_row_to_table("Gizmo elements", ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT, std::string(buf), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5833 ImGui::EndTable();
5834 }
5835
5836 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<SceneRaycasterItem>>* gizmo_raycasters = m_scene_raycaster.get_raycasters(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo);
5837 if (gizmo_raycasters != nullptr && !gizmo_raycasters->empty()) {
5838 ImGui::Separator();
5839 imgui.text("Gizmo raycasters IDs:");
5840 if (ImGui::BeginTable("GizmoRaycasters", 3)) {
5841 for (size_t i = 0; i < gizmo_raycasters->size(); ++i) {
5842 add_strings_row_to_table(std::to_string(i), ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_LIGHT,
5843 std::to_string(SceneRaycaster::decode_id(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, (*gizmo_raycasters)[i]->get_id())), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text),
5844 to_string(Geometry::Transformation((*gizmo_raycasters)[i]->get_transform()).get_offset()), ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Text));
5845 }
5846 ImGui::EndTable();
5847 }
5848 }
5849
5850 imgui.end();
5851#endif // ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
5852}
Slic3r::GUI::ClippingPlane::inverted_normal

Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::m_mouse

Definition GLCanvas3D.hpp:488

◆ _rectangular_selection_picking_pass()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_rectangular_selection_picking_pass ( )
private
5855{
5856 m_gizmos.set_hover_id(-1);
5857
5858 std::set<int> idxs;
5859
5860 if (m_picking_enabled) {
5861 const size_t width = std::max<size_t>(m_rectangle_selection.get_width(), 1);
5862 const size_t height = std::max<size_t>(m_rectangle_selection.get_height(), 1);
5863
5864 const OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType framebuffers_type = OpenGLManager::get_framebuffers_type();
5865 bool use_framebuffer = framebuffers_type != OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType::Unknown;
5866
5867 GLuint render_fbo = 0;
5868 GLuint render_tex = 0;
5869 GLuint render_depth = 0;
5870 if (use_framebuffer) {
5871 // setup a framebuffer which covers only the selection rectangle
5872 if (framebuffers_type == OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType::Arb) {
5873 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
5874 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, render_fbo));
5875 }
5876 else {
5877 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffersEXT(1, &render_fbo));
5878 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, render_fbo));
5879 }
5880 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &render_tex));
5881 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex));
5882 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, width, height, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5883 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST));
5884 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST));
5885 if (framebuffers_type == OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType::Arb) {
5886 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex, 0));
5887 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
5888 glsafe(::glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
5889#if ENABLE_OPENGL_ES
5890 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT16, width, height));
5891#else
5892 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, width, height));
5893#endif // ENABLE_OPENGL_ES
5894 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
5895 }
5896 else {
5897 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT, GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex, 0));
5898 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffersEXT(1, &render_depth));
5899 glsafe(::glBindRenderbufferEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_depth));
5900 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, width, height));
5901 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT_EXT, GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_depth));
5902 }
5903 const GLenum drawBufs[] = { GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0 };
5904 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
5905 if (framebuffers_type == OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType::Arb) {
5906 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER) != GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE)
5907 use_framebuffer = false;
5908 }
5909 else {
5910 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT) != GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT)
5911 use_framebuffer = false;
5912 }
5913 }
5914
5915 if (m_multisample_allowed)
5916 // This flag is often ignored by NVIDIA drivers if rendering into a screen buffer.
5917 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5918
5919 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_BLEND));
5920 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
5921
5922 glsafe(::glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
5923
5924 const Camera& main_camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
5925 Camera framebuffer_camera;
5926 framebuffer_camera.set_type(main_camera.get_type());
5927 const Camera* camera = &main_camera;
5928 if (use_framebuffer) {
5929 // setup a camera which covers only the selection rectangle
5930 const std::array<int, 4>& viewport = camera->get_viewport();
5931 const double near_left = camera->get_near_left();
5932 const double near_bottom = camera->get_near_bottom();
5933 const double near_width = camera->get_near_width();
5934 const double near_height = camera->get_near_height();
5935
5936 const double ratio_x = near_width / double(viewport[2]);
5937 const double ratio_y = near_height / double(viewport[3]);
5938
5939 const double rect_near_left = near_left + double(m_rectangle_selection.get_left()) * ratio_x;
5940 const double rect_near_bottom = near_bottom + (double(viewport[3]) - double(m_rectangle_selection.get_bottom())) * ratio_y;
5941 double rect_near_right = near_left + double(m_rectangle_selection.get_right()) * ratio_x;
5942 double rect_near_top = near_bottom + (double(viewport[3]) - double(m_rectangle_selection.get_top())) * ratio_y;
5943
5944 if (rect_near_left == rect_near_right)
5945 rect_near_right = rect_near_left + ratio_x;
5946 if (rect_near_bottom == rect_near_top)
5947 rect_near_top = rect_near_bottom + ratio_y;
5948
5949 framebuffer_camera.look_at(camera->get_position(), camera->get_target(), camera->get_dir_up());
5950 framebuffer_camera.apply_projection(rect_near_left, rect_near_right, rect_near_bottom, rect_near_top, camera->get_near_z(), camera->get_far_z());
5951 framebuffer_camera.set_viewport(0, 0, width, height);
5952 framebuffer_camera.apply_viewport();
5953 camera = &framebuffer_camera;
5954 }
5955
5956 _render_volumes_for_picking(*camera);
5957 _render_bed_for_picking(camera->get_view_matrix(), camera->get_projection_matrix(), !camera->is_looking_downward());
5958
5959 if (m_multisample_allowed)
5960 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5961
5962 const size_t px_count = width * height;
5963
5964 const size_t left = use_framebuffer ? 0 : (size_t)m_rectangle_selection.get_left();
5965 const size_t top = use_framebuffer ? 0 : (size_t)get_canvas_size().get_height() - (size_t)m_rectangle_selection.get_top();
5966#define USE_PARALLEL 1
5967#if USE_PARALLEL
5968 struct Pixel
5969 {
5970 std::array<GLubyte, 4> data;
5971 // Only non-interpolated colors are valid, those have their lowest three bits zeroed.
5972 bool valid() const { return picking_checksum_alpha_channel(data[0], data[1], data[2]) == data[3]; }
5973 // we reserve color = (0,0,0) for occluders (as the printbed)
5974 // volumes' id are shifted by 1
5975 // see: _render_volumes_for_picking()
5976 int id() const { return data[0] + (data[1] << 8) + (data[2] << 16) - 1; }
5977 };
5978
5979 std::vector<Pixel> frame(px_count);
5980 glsafe(::glReadPixels(left, top, width, height, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)frame.data()));
5981
5982 tbb::spin_mutex mutex;
5983 tbb::parallel_for(tbb::blocked_range<size_t>(0, frame.size(), (size_t)width),
5984 [this, &frame, &idxs, &mutex](const tbb::blocked_range<size_t>& range) {
5985 for (size_t i = range.begin(); i < range.end(); ++i)
5986 if (frame[i].valid()) {
5987 int volume_id = frame[i].id();
5988 if (0 <= volume_id && volume_id < (int)m_volumes.volumes.size()) {
5989 mutex.lock();
5990 idxs.insert(volume_id);
5991 mutex.unlock();
5992 }
5993 }
5994 });
5995#else
5996 std::vector<GLubyte> frame(4 * px_count);
5997 glsafe(::glReadPixels(left, top, width, height, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)frame.data()));
5998
5999 for (int i = 0; i < px_count; ++i) {
6000 int px_id = 4 * i;
6001 int volume_id = frame[px_id] + (frame[px_id + 1] << 8) + (frame[px_id + 2] << 16);
6002 if (0 <= volume_id && volume_id < (int)m_volumes.volumes.size())
6003 idxs.insert(volume_id);
6004 }
6005#endif // USE_PARALLEL
6006 if (camera != &main_camera)
6007 main_camera.apply_viewport();
6008
6009 if (framebuffers_type == OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType::Arb) {
6010 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0));
6011 if (render_depth != 0)
6012 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
6013 if (render_fbo != 0)
6014 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
6015 }
6016 else if (framebuffers_type == OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType::Ext) {
6017 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, 0));
6018 if (render_depth != 0)
6019 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffersEXT(1, &render_depth));
6020 if (render_fbo != 0)
6021 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffersEXT(1, &render_fbo));
6022 }
6023
6024 if (render_tex != 0)
6025 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &render_tex));
6026 }
6027
6028 m_hover_volume_idxs.assign(idxs.begin(), idxs.end());
6029 _update_volumes_hover_state();
6030}

◆ _refresh_if_shown_on_screen()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_refresh_if_shown_on_screen ( )
private
5690{
5691 if (_is_shown_on_screen()) {
5692 const Size& cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
5693 _resize((unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width(), (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height());
5694
5695 // When the application starts the following call to render() triggers the opengl initialization.
5696 // We need to ask for an extra call to reload_scene() to force the generation of the model for wipe tower
5697 // for printers using it, which is skipped by all the previous calls to reload_scene() because m_initialized == false
5698 const bool requires_reload_scene = !m_initialized;
5699
5700 // Because of performance problems on macOS, where PaintEvents are not delivered
5701 // frequently enough, we call render() here directly when we can.
5702 render();
5703 assert(m_initialized);
5704 if (requires_reload_scene) {
5705 if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_view3D_shown())
5706 reload_scene(true);
5707 }
5708 }
5709}
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::reload_scene
void reload_scene(bool refresh_immediately, bool force_full_scene_refresh=false)

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_arrange_menu ( float  pos_x)
private
4821{
4822 ImGuiWrapper *imgui = wxGetApp().imgui();
4823
4824 imgui->set_next_window_pos(pos_x, m_main_toolbar.get_height(), ImGuiCond_Always, 0.5f, 0.0f);
4825
4826 imgui->begin(_L("Arrange options"), ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMove | ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse);
4827
4828 ArrangeSettings settings = get_arrange_settings();
4829 ArrangeSettings &settings_out = get_arrange_settings_ref(this);
4830
4831 auto &appcfg = wxGetApp().app_config;
4832 PrinterTechnology ptech = current_printer_technology();
4833
4834 bool settings_changed = false;
4835 float dist_min = 0.f;
4836 float dist_bed_min = 0.f;
4837 std::string dist_key = "min_object_distance";
4838 std::string dist_bed_key = "min_bed_distance";
4839 std::string rot_key = "enable_rotation";
4840 std::string align_key = "alignment";
4841 std::string postfix;
4842
4843 if (ptech == ptSLA) {
4844 postfix = "_sla";
4845 } else if (ptech == ptFFF) {
4846 auto co_opt = m_config->option<ConfigOptionBool>("complete_objects");
4847 if (co_opt && co_opt->value) {
4848 dist_min = float(min_object_distance(*m_config));
4849 postfix = "_fff_seq_print";
4850 } else {
4851 dist_min = 0.f;
4852 postfix = "_fff";
4853 }
4854 }
4855
4856 dist_key += postfix;
4857 dist_bed_key += postfix;
4858 rot_key += postfix;
4859 align_key += postfix;
4860
4861 imgui->text(GUI::format_wxstr(_L("Press %1%left mouse button to enter the exact value"), shortkey_ctrl_prefix()));
4862
4863 if (imgui->slider_float(_L("Spacing"), &settings.distance, dist_min, 100.0f, "%5.2f") || dist_min > settings.distance) {
4864 settings.distance = std::max(dist_min, settings.distance);
4865 settings_out.distance = settings.distance;
4866 appcfg->set("arrange", dist_key.c_str(), float_to_string_decimal_point(settings_out.distance));
4867 settings_changed = true;
4868 }
4869
4870 if (imgui->slider_float(_L("Spacing from bed"), &settings.distance_from_bed, dist_bed_min, 100.0f, "%5.2f") || dist_bed_min > settings.distance_from_bed) {
4871 settings.distance_from_bed = std::max(dist_bed_min, settings.distance_from_bed);
4872 settings_out.distance_from_bed = settings.distance_from_bed;
4873 appcfg->set("arrange", dist_bed_key.c_str(), float_to_string_decimal_point(settings_out.distance_from_bed));
4874 settings_changed = true;
4875 }
4876
4877 if (imgui->checkbox(_L("Enable rotations (slow)"), settings.enable_rotation)) {
4878 settings_out.enable_rotation = settings.enable_rotation;
4879 appcfg->set("arrange", rot_key.c_str(), settings_out.enable_rotation? "1" : "0");
4880 settings_changed = true;
4881 }
4882
4883 Points bed = m_config ? get_bed_shape(*m_config) : Points{};
4884
4885 if (arrangement::is_box(bed) && settings.alignment >= 0 &&
4886 imgui->combo(_L("Alignment"), {_u8L("Center"), _u8L("Rear left"), _u8L("Front left"), _u8L("Front right"), _u8L("Rear right"), _u8L("Random") }, settings.alignment)) {
4887 settings_out.alignment = settings.alignment;
4888 appcfg->set("arrange", align_key.c_str(), std::to_string(settings_out.alignment));
4889 settings_changed = true;
4890 }
4891
4892 ImGui::Separator();
4893
4894 if (imgui->button(_L("Reset"))) {
4895 auto alignment = settings_out.alignment;
4896 settings_out = ArrangeSettings{};
4897 settings_out.distance = std::max(dist_min, settings_out.distance);
4898
4899 // Default alignment for XL printers set explicitly:
4900 if (is_arrange_alignment_enabled())
4901 settings_out.alignment = static_cast<int>(arrangement::Pivots::BottomLeft);
4902 else
4903 settings_out.alignment = alignment;
4904
4905 appcfg->set("arrange", dist_key.c_str(), float_to_string_decimal_point(settings_out.distance));
4906 appcfg->set("arrange", dist_bed_key.c_str(), float_to_string_decimal_point(settings_out.distance_from_bed));
4907 appcfg->set("arrange", rot_key.c_str(), settings_out.enable_rotation? "1" : "0");
4908 settings_changed = true;
4909 }
4910
4911 ImGui::SameLine();
4912
4913 if (imgui->button(_L("Arrange"))) {
4914 wxGetApp().plater()->arrange();
4915 }
4916
4917 imgui->end();
4918
4919 return settings_changed;
4920}

◆ _render_background()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_background ( )
private
6033{
6034 bool use_error_color = false;
6035 if (wxGetApp().is_editor()) {
6036 use_error_color = m_dynamic_background_enabled &&
6037 (current_printer_technology() != ptSLA || !m_volumes.empty());
6038
6039 if (!m_volumes.empty())
6040 use_error_color &= _is_any_volume_outside().first;
6041 else
6042 use_error_color &= m_gcode_viewer.has_data() && !m_gcode_viewer.is_contained_in_bed();
6043 }
6044
6045 // Draws a bottom to top gradient over the complete screen.
6046 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
6047
6048 const ColorRGBA bottom_color = use_error_color ? ERROR_BG_DARK_COLOR : DEFAULT_BG_DARK_COLOR;
6049
6050 if (!m_background.is_initialized()) {
6051 m_background.reset();
6052
6053 GLModel::Geometry init_data;
6054 init_data.format = { GLModel::Geometry::EPrimitiveType::Triangles, GLModel::Geometry::EVertexLayout::P2T2 };
6055 init_data.reserve_vertices(4);
6056 init_data.reserve_indices(6);
6057
6058 // vertices
6059 init_data.add_vertex(Vec2f(-1.0f, -1.0f), Vec2f(0.0f, 0.0f));
6060 init_data.add_vertex(Vec2f(1.0f, -1.0f), Vec2f(1.0f, 0.0f));
6061 init_data.add_vertex(Vec2f(1.0f, 1.0f), Vec2f(1.0f, 1.0f));
6062 init_data.add_vertex(Vec2f(-1.0f, 1.0f), Vec2f(0.0f, 1.0f));
6063
6064 // indices
6065 init_data.add_triangle(0, 1, 2);
6066 init_data.add_triangle(2, 3, 0);
6067
6068 m_background.init_from(std::move(init_data));
6069 }
6070
6071 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader("background");
6072 if (shader != nullptr) {
6073 shader->start_using();
6074 shader->set_uniform("top_color", use_error_color ? ERROR_BG_LIGHT_COLOR : DEFAULT_BG_LIGHT_COLOR);
6075 shader->set_uniform("bottom_color", bottom_color);
6076 m_background.render();
6077 shader->stop_using();
6078 }
6079
6080 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
6081}

◆ _render_objects()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_objects ( GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType  type)
private
6116{
6117 if (m_volumes.empty())
6118 return;
6119
6120 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
6121
6122 m_camera_clipping_plane = m_gizmos.get_clipping_plane();
6123
6124 if (m_picking_enabled)
6125 // Update the layer editing selection to the first object selected, update the current object maximum Z.
6126 m_layers_editing.select_object(*m_model, this->is_layers_editing_enabled() ? m_selection.get_object_idx() : -1);
6127
6128 if (const BuildVolume &build_volume = m_bed.build_volume(); build_volume.valid()) {
6129 switch (build_volume.type()) {
6130 case BuildVolume::Type::Rectangle: {
6131 const BoundingBox3Base<Vec3d> bed_bb = build_volume.bounding_volume().inflated(BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon);
6132 m_volumes.set_print_volume({ 0, // circle
6133 { float(bed_bb.min.x()), float(bed_bb.min.y()), float(bed_bb.max.x()), float(bed_bb.max.y()) },
6134 { 0.0f, float(build_volume.max_print_height()) } });
6135 break;
6136 }
6137 case BuildVolume::Type::Circle: {
6138 m_volumes.set_print_volume({ 1, // rectangle
6139 { unscaled<float>(build_volume.circle().center.x()), unscaled<float>(build_volume.circle().center.y()), unscaled<float>(build_volume.circle().radius + BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon), 0.0f },
6140 { 0.0f, float(build_volume.max_print_height() + BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon) } });
6141 break;
6142 }
6143 default:
6144 case BuildVolume::Type::Convex:
6145 case BuildVolume::Type::Custom: {
6146 m_volumes.set_print_volume({ static_cast<int>(type),
6147 { -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX },
6148 { -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX } }
6149 );
6150 }
6151 }
6152 if (m_requires_check_outside_state) {
6153 check_volumes_outside_state(build_volume, nullptr);
6154 m_requires_check_outside_state = false;
6155 }
6156 }
6157
6158 if (m_use_clipping_planes)
6159 m_volumes.set_z_range(-m_clipping_planes[0].get_data()[3], m_clipping_planes[1].get_data()[3]);
6160 else
6161 m_volumes.set_z_range(-FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
6162
6163 m_volumes.set_clipping_plane(m_camera_clipping_plane.get_data());
6164 m_volumes.set_show_sinking_contours(! m_gizmos.is_hiding_instances());
6165 m_volumes.set_show_non_manifold_edges(!m_gizmos.is_hiding_instances() && m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::Simplify);
6166
6167 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader("gouraud");
6168 if (shader != nullptr) {
6169 shader->start_using();
6170
6171 switch (type)
6172 {
6173 default:
6174 case GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Opaque:
6175 {
6176 if (m_picking_enabled && !m_gizmos.is_dragging() && m_layers_editing.is_enabled() && (m_layers_editing.last_object_id != -1) && (m_layers_editing.object_max_z() > 0.0f)) {
6177 int object_id = m_layers_editing.last_object_id;
6178 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
6179 m_volumes.render(type, false, camera.get_view_matrix(), camera.get_projection_matrix(), [object_id](const GLVolume& volume) {
6180 // Which volume to paint without the layer height profile shader?
6181 return volume.is_active && (volume.is_modifier || volume.composite_id.object_id != object_id);
6182 });
6183 // Let LayersEditing handle rendering of the active object using the layer height profile shader.
6184 m_layers_editing.render_volumes(*this, m_volumes);
6185 }
6186 else {
6187 // do not cull backfaces to show broken geometry, if any
6188 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
6189 m_volumes.render(type, m_picking_enabled, camera.get_view_matrix(), camera.get_projection_matrix(), [this](const GLVolume& volume) {
6190 return (m_render_sla_auxiliaries || volume.composite_id.volume_id >= 0);
6191 });
6192 }
6193
6194 // In case a painting gizmo is open, it should render the painted triangles
6195 // before transparent objects are rendered. Otherwise they would not be
6196 // visible when inside modifier meshes etc.
6197 {
6198 GLGizmosManager& gm = get_gizmos_manager();
6199// GLGizmosManager::EType type = gm.get_current_type();
6200 if (dynamic_cast<GLGizmoPainterBase*>(gm.get_current())) {
6201 shader->stop_using();
6202 gm.render_painter_gizmo();
6203 shader->start_using();
6204 }
6205 }
6206 break;
6207 }
6208 case GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Transparent:
6209 {
6210 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
6211 m_volumes.render(type, false, camera.get_view_matrix(), camera.get_projection_matrix());
6212 break;
6213 }
6214 }
6215 shader->stop_using();
6216 }
6217
6218 m_camera_clipping_plane = ClippingPlane::ClipsNothing();
6219}
Slic3r::BuildVolume::Type::Circle
@ Circle
Slic3r::BuildVolume::Type::Convex
@ Convex
Slic3r::BuildVolume::Type::Custom
@ Custom
Slic3r::BuildVolume::Type::Rectangle
@ Rectangle
Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon
static constexpr const double SceneEpsilon
Definition BuildVolume.hpp:79
Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::set_clipping_plane
void set_clipping_plane(const std::array< double, 4 > &coeffs)
Definition 3DScene.hpp:431
Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::set_z_range
void set_z_range(float min_z, float max_z)
Definition 3DScene.hpp:430
Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::set_print_volume
void set_print_volume(const PrintVolume &print_volume)
Definition 3DScene.hpp:428
Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Transparent
@ Transparent

4801 // selected == 9999 means that Esc kye was pressed
4802 /*// revert commit https://github.com/prusa3d/PrusaSlicer/commit/91897589928789b261ca0dc735ffd46f2b0b99f2
4803 if (selected == 9999)
4804 action_taken = true;
4805 else
4806 sidebar.jump_to_option(selected);*/

4808 imgui->end(); // end imgui before the jump to option
4809 sidebar.jump_to_option(selected);
4810 return true;
4811 }
4812 action_taken = true;
4813 }
4814
4815 imgui->end();
4816
4817 return action_taken;
4818}

◆ _render_sla_slices()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_sla_slices ( )
private
6557{
6558 if (!m_use_clipping_planes || current_printer_technology() != ptSLA)
6559 return;
6560
6561 const SLAPrint* print = this->sla_print();
6562 const PrintObjects& print_objects = print->objects();
6563 if (print_objects.empty())
6564 // nothing to render, return
6565 return;
6566
6567 double clip_min_z = -m_clipping_planes[0].get_data()[3];
6568 double clip_max_z = m_clipping_planes[1].get_data()[3];
6569 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (unsigned int)print_objects.size(); ++i) {
6570 const SLAPrintObject* obj = print_objects[i];
6571
6572 if (!obj->is_step_done(slaposSliceSupports))
6573 continue;
6574
6575 SlaCap::ObjectIdToModelsMap::iterator it_caps_bottom = m_sla_caps[0].triangles.find(i);
6576 SlaCap::ObjectIdToModelsMap::iterator it_caps_top = m_sla_caps[1].triangles.find(i);
6577 {
6578 if (it_caps_bottom == m_sla_caps[0].triangles.end())
6579 it_caps_bottom = m_sla_caps[0].triangles.emplace(i, SlaCap::Triangles()).first;
6580 if (!m_sla_caps[0].matches(clip_min_z)) {
6581 m_sla_caps[0].z = clip_min_z;
6582 it_caps_bottom->second.object.reset();
6583 it_caps_bottom->second.supports.reset();
6584 }
6585 if (it_caps_top == m_sla_caps[1].triangles.end())
6586 it_caps_top = m_sla_caps[1].triangles.emplace(i, SlaCap::Triangles()).first;
6587 if (!m_sla_caps[1].matches(clip_max_z)) {
6588 m_sla_caps[1].z = clip_max_z;
6589 it_caps_top->second.object.reset();
6590 it_caps_top->second.supports.reset();
6591 }
6592 }
6593 GLModel& bottom_obj_triangles = it_caps_bottom->second.object;
6594 GLModel& bottom_sup_triangles = it_caps_bottom->second.supports;
6595 GLModel& top_obj_triangles = it_caps_top->second.object;
6596 GLModel& top_sup_triangles = it_caps_top->second.supports;
6597
6598 auto init_model = [](GLModel& model, const Pointf3s& triangles, const ColorRGBA& color) {
6599 GLModel::Geometry init_data;
6600 init_data.format = { GLModel::Geometry::EPrimitiveType::Triangles, GLModel::Geometry::EVertexLayout::P3 };
6601 init_data.reserve_vertices(triangles.size());
6602 init_data.reserve_indices(triangles.size() / 3);
6603 init_data.color = color;
6604
6605 unsigned int vertices_count = 0;
6606 for (const Vec3d& v : triangles) {
6607 init_data.add_vertex((Vec3f)v.cast<float>());
6608 ++vertices_count;
6609 if (vertices_count % 3 == 0)
6610 init_data.add_triangle(vertices_count - 3, vertices_count - 2, vertices_count - 1);
6611 }
6612
6613 if (!init_data.is_empty())
6614 model.init_from(std::move(init_data));
6615 };
6616
6617 if ((!bottom_obj_triangles.is_initialized() || !bottom_sup_triangles.is_initialized() ||
6618 !top_obj_triangles.is_initialized() || !top_sup_triangles.is_initialized()) && !obj->get_slice_index().empty()) {
6619 double layer_height = print->default_object_config().layer_height.value;
6620 double initial_layer_height = print->material_config().initial_layer_height.value;
6621 bool left_handed = obj->is_left_handed();
6622
6623 coord_t key_zero = obj->get_slice_index().front().print_level();
6624 // Slice at the center of the slab starting at clip_min_z will be rendered for the lower plane.
6625 coord_t key_low = coord_t((clip_min_z - initial_layer_height + layer_height) / SCALING_FACTOR) + key_zero;
6626 // Slice at the center of the slab ending at clip_max_z will be rendered for the upper plane.
6627 coord_t key_high = coord_t((clip_max_z - initial_layer_height) / SCALING_FACTOR) + key_zero;
6628
6629 const SliceRecord& slice_low = obj->closest_slice_to_print_level(key_low, coord_t(SCALED_EPSILON));
6630 const SliceRecord& slice_high = obj->closest_slice_to_print_level(key_high, coord_t(SCALED_EPSILON));
6631
6632 // Offset to avoid OpenGL Z fighting between the object's horizontal surfaces and the triangluated surfaces of the cuts.
6633 const double plane_shift_z = 0.002;
6634
6635 if (slice_low.is_valid()) {
6636 const ExPolygons& obj_bottom = slice_low.get_slice(soModel);
6637 const ExPolygons& sup_bottom = slice_low.get_slice(soSupport);
6638 // calculate model bottom cap
6639 if (!bottom_obj_triangles.is_initialized() && !obj_bottom.empty())
6640 init_model(bottom_obj_triangles, triangulate_expolygons_3d(obj_bottom, clip_min_z - plane_shift_z, !left_handed), { 1.0f, 0.37f, 0.0f, 1.0f });
6641 // calculate support bottom cap
6642 if (!bottom_sup_triangles.is_initialized() && !sup_bottom.empty())
6643 init_model(bottom_sup_triangles, triangulate_expolygons_3d(sup_bottom, clip_min_z - plane_shift_z, !left_handed), { 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.37f, 1.0f });
6644 }
6645
6646 if (slice_high.is_valid()) {
6647 const ExPolygons& obj_top = slice_high.get_slice(soModel);
6648 const ExPolygons& sup_top = slice_high.get_slice(soSupport);
6649 // calculate model top cap
6650 if (!top_obj_triangles.is_initialized() && !obj_top.empty())
6651 init_model(top_obj_triangles, triangulate_expolygons_3d(obj_top, clip_max_z + plane_shift_z, left_handed), { 1.0f, 0.37f, 0.0f, 1.0f });
6652 // calculate support top cap
6653 if (!top_sup_triangles.is_initialized() && !sup_top.empty())
6654 init_model(top_sup_triangles, triangulate_expolygons_3d(sup_top, clip_max_z + plane_shift_z, left_handed), { 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.37f, 1.0f });
6655 }
6656 }
6657
6658 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader("flat");
6659 if (shader != nullptr) {
6660 shader->start_using();
6661
6662 for (const SLAPrintObject::Instance& inst : obj->instances()) {
6663 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
6664 Transform3d view_model_matrix = camera.get_view_matrix() *
6665 Geometry::translation_transform({ unscale<double>(inst.shift.x()), unscale<double>(inst.shift.y()), 0.0 }) *
6666 Geometry::rotation_transform(inst.rotation * Vec3d::UnitZ());
6667 if (obj->is_left_handed())
6668 view_model_matrix = view_model_matrix * Geometry::scale_transform({ -1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f });
6669
6670 shader->set_uniform("view_model_matrix", view_model_matrix);
6671 shader->set_uniform("projection_matrix", camera.get_projection_matrix());
6672
6673 bottom_obj_triangles.render();
6674 top_obj_triangles.render();
6675 bottom_sup_triangles.render();
6676 top_sup_triangles.render();
6677 }
6678
6679 shader->stop_using();
6680 }
6681 }
6682}

◆ _render_thumbnail_framebuffer()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_thumbnail_framebuffer ( ThumbnailData &  thumbnail_data,
unsigned int  w,
unsigned int  h,
const ThumbnailsParams &  thumbnail_params,
const GLVolumeCollection &  volumes,
Camera::EType  camera_type 
)
private
5037{
5038 thumbnail_data.set(w, h);
5039 if (!thumbnail_data.is_valid())
5040 return;
5041
5042 bool multisample = m_multisample_allowed;
5043 if (multisample)
5044 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5045
5046 GLint max_samples;
5047 glsafe(::glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_SAMPLES, &max_samples));
5048 GLsizei num_samples = max_samples / 2;
5049
5050 GLuint render_fbo;
5051 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
5052 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, render_fbo));
5053
5054 GLuint render_tex = 0;
5055 GLuint render_tex_buffer = 0;
5056 if (multisample) {
5057 // use renderbuffer instead of texture to avoid the need to use glTexImage2DMultisample which is available only since OpenGL 3.2
5058 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffers(1, &render_tex_buffer));
5059 glsafe(::glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_tex_buffer));
5060 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisample(GL_RENDERBUFFER, num_samples, GL_RGBA8, w, h));
5061 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_tex_buffer));
5062 }
5063 else {
5064 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &render_tex));
5065 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex));
5066 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5067 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5068 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5069 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex, 0));
5070 }
5071
5072 GLuint render_depth;
5073 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
5074 glsafe(::glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
5075 if (multisample)
5076 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisample(GL_RENDERBUFFER, num_samples, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, w, h));
5077 else
5078 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, w, h));
5079
5080 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
5081
5082 GLenum drawBufs[] = { GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0 };
5083 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
5084
5085 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE) {
5086 _render_thumbnail_internal(thumbnail_data, thumbnail_params, volumes, camera_type);
5087
5088 if (multisample) {
5089 GLuint resolve_fbo;
5090 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffers(1, &resolve_fbo));
5091 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
5092
5093 GLuint resolve_tex;
5094 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
5095 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex));
5096 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5097 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5098 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5099 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex, 0));
5100
5101 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
5102
5103 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE) {
5104 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, render_fbo));
5105 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
5106 glsafe(::glBlitFramebuffer(0, 0, w, h, 0, 0, w, h, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_LINEAR));
5107
5108 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
5109 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
5110 }
5111
5112 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
5113 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &resolve_fbo));
5114 }
5115 else
5116 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
5117
5118#if ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT
5119 debug_output_thumbnail(thumbnail_data);
5120#endif // ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT
5121 }
5122
5123 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0));
5124 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
5125 if (render_tex_buffer != 0)
5126 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &render_tex_buffer));
5127 if (render_tex != 0)
5128 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &render_tex));
5129 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
5130
5131 if (multisample)
5132 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5133}
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_thumbnail_internal
void _render_thumbnail_internal(ThumbnailData &thumbnail_data, const ThumbnailsParams &thumbnail_params, const GLVolumeCollection &volumes, Camera::EType camera_type)

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_thumbnail_framebuffer_ext ( ThumbnailData &  thumbnail_data,
unsigned int  w,
unsigned int  h,
const ThumbnailsParams &  thumbnail_params,
const GLVolumeCollection &  volumes,
Camera::EType  camera_type 
)
private
5136{
5137 thumbnail_data.set(w, h);
5138 if (!thumbnail_data.is_valid())
5139 return;
5140
5141 bool multisample = m_multisample_allowed;
5142 if (multisample)
5143 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5144
5145 GLint max_samples;
5146 glsafe(::glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_SAMPLES_EXT, &max_samples));
5147 GLsizei num_samples = max_samples / 2;
5148
5149 GLuint render_fbo;
5150 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffersEXT(1, &render_fbo));
5151 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, render_fbo));
5152
5153 GLuint render_tex = 0;
5154 GLuint render_tex_buffer = 0;
5155 if (multisample) {
5156 // use renderbuffer instead of texture to avoid the need to use glTexImage2DMultisample which is available only since OpenGL 3.2
5157 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffersEXT(1, &render_tex_buffer));
5158 glsafe(::glBindRenderbufferEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_tex_buffer));
5159 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisampleEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, num_samples, GL_RGBA8, w, h));
5160 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT, GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_tex_buffer));
5161 }
5162 else {
5163 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &render_tex));
5164 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex));
5165 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5166 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5167 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5168 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT, GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex, 0));
5169 }
5170
5171 GLuint render_depth;
5172 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffersEXT(1, &render_depth));
5173 glsafe(::glBindRenderbufferEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_depth));
5174 if (multisample)
5175 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisampleEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, num_samples, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, w, h));
5176 else
5177 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, w, h));
5178
5179 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT_EXT, GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_depth));
5180
5181 GLenum drawBufs[] = { GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0 };
5182 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
5183
5184 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT) {
5185 _render_thumbnail_internal(thumbnail_data, thumbnail_params, volumes, camera_type);
5186
5187 if (multisample) {
5188 GLuint resolve_fbo;
5189 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffersEXT(1, &resolve_fbo));
5190 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, resolve_fbo));
5191
5192 GLuint resolve_tex;
5193 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
5194 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex));
5195 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5196 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5197 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5198 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2DEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT, GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex, 0));
5199
5200 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
5201
5202 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT) {
5203 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, render_fbo));
5204 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, resolve_fbo));
5205 glsafe(::glBlitFramebufferEXT(0, 0, w, h, 0, 0, w, h, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_LINEAR));
5206
5207 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, resolve_fbo));
5208 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
5209 }
5210
5211 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
5212 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffersEXT(1, &resolve_fbo));
5213 }
5214 else
5215 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
5216
5217#if ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT
5218 debug_output_thumbnail(thumbnail_data);
5219#endif // ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT
5220 }
5221
5222 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, 0));
5223 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffersEXT(1, &render_depth));
5224 if (render_tex_buffer != 0)
5225 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffersEXT(1, &render_tex_buffer));
5226 if (render_tex != 0)
5227 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &render_tex));
5228 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffersEXT(1, &render_fbo));
5229
5230 if (multisample)
5231 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5232}
