◆ reload_scene()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::reload_scene ( bool  refresh_immediately,
bool  force_full_scene_refresh = false 
)
2247{
2248 if (m_canvas == nullptr || m_config == nullptr || m_model == nullptr)
2249 return;
2250
2251 if (!m_initialized)
2252 return;
2253
2254 _set_current();
2255
2256 m_hover_volume_idxs.clear();
2257
2258 struct ModelVolumeState {
2259 ModelVolumeState(const GLVolume* volume) :
2260 model_volume(nullptr), geometry_id(volume->geometry_id), volume_idx(-1) {}
2261 ModelVolumeState(const ModelVolume* model_volume, const ObjectID& instance_id, const GLVolume::CompositeID& composite_id) :
2262 model_volume(model_volume), geometry_id(std::make_pair(model_volume->id().id, instance_id.id)), composite_id(composite_id), volume_idx(-1) {}
2263 ModelVolumeState(const ObjectID& volume_id, const ObjectID& instance_id) :
2264 model_volume(nullptr), geometry_id(std::make_pair(volume_id.id, instance_id.id)), volume_idx(-1) {}
2265 bool new_geometry() const { return this->volume_idx == size_t(-1); }
2266 const ModelVolume* model_volume;
2267 // ObjectID of ModelVolume + ObjectID of ModelInstance
2268 // or timestamp of an SLAPrintObjectStep + ObjectID of ModelInstance
2269 std::pair<size_t, size_t> geometry_id;
2270 GLVolume::CompositeID composite_id;
2271 // Volume index in the new GLVolume vector.
2272 size_t volume_idx;
2273 };
2274 std::vector<ModelVolumeState> model_volume_state;
2275 std::vector<ModelVolumeState> aux_volume_state;
2276
2277 struct GLVolumeState {
2278 GLVolumeState() :
2279 volume_idx(size_t(-1)) {}
2280 GLVolumeState(const GLVolume* volume, unsigned int volume_idx) :
2281 composite_id(volume->composite_id), volume_idx(volume_idx) {}
2282 GLVolumeState(const GLVolume::CompositeID &composite_id) :
2283 composite_id(composite_id), volume_idx(size_t(-1)) {}
2284
2285 GLVolume::CompositeID composite_id;
2286 // Volume index in the old GLVolume vector.
2287 size_t volume_idx;
2288 };
2289
2290 std::vector<std::pair<GLVolume::CompositeID, GLVolume::CompositeID>> new_to_old_ids_map;
2291
2292 // SLA steps to pull the preview meshes for.
2293 typedef std::array<SLAPrintObjectStep, 3> SLASteps;
2294 SLASteps sla_steps = { slaposDrillHoles, slaposSupportTree, slaposPad };
2295 struct SLASupportState {
2296 std::array<PrintStateBase::StateWithTimeStamp, std::tuple_size<SLASteps>::value> step;
2297 };
2298 // State of the sla_steps for all SLAPrintObjects.
2299 std::vector<SLASupportState> sla_support_state;
2300
2301 std::vector<size_t> instance_ids_selected;
2302 std::vector<size_t> map_glvolume_old_to_new(m_volumes.volumes.size(), size_t(-1));
2303 std::vector<GLVolumeState> deleted_volumes;
2304 std::vector<GLVolume*> glvolumes_new;
2305 glvolumes_new.reserve(m_volumes.volumes.size());
2306 auto model_volume_state_lower = [](const ModelVolumeState& m1, const ModelVolumeState& m2) { return m1.geometry_id < m2.geometry_id; };
2307
2308 m_reload_delayed = !m_canvas->IsShown() && !refresh_immediately && !force_full_scene_refresh;
2309
2310 PrinterTechnology printer_technology = current_printer_technology();
2311 int volume_idx_wipe_tower_old = -1;
2312
2313 // Release invalidated volumes to conserve GPU memory in case of delayed refresh (see m_reload_delayed).
2314 // First initialize model_volumes_new_sorted & model_instances_new_sorted.
2315 for (int object_idx = 0; object_idx < (int)m_model->objects.size(); ++object_idx) {
2316 const ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[object_idx];
2317 for (int instance_idx = 0; instance_idx < (int)model_object->instances.size(); ++instance_idx) {
2318 const ModelInstance* model_instance = model_object->instances[instance_idx];
2319 for (int volume_idx = 0; volume_idx < (int)model_object->volumes.size(); ++volume_idx) {
2320 const ModelVolume* model_volume = model_object->volumes[volume_idx];
2321 model_volume_state.emplace_back(model_volume, model_instance->id(), GLVolume::CompositeID(object_idx, volume_idx, instance_idx));
2322 }
2323 }
2324 }
2325
2326 if (printer_technology == ptSLA) {
2327 const SLAPrint* sla_print = this->sla_print();
2328#ifndef NDEBUG
2329 // Verify that the SLAPrint object is synchronized with m_model.
2330 check_model_ids_equal(*m_model, sla_print->model());
2331#endif // NDEBUG
2332 sla_support_state.reserve(sla_print->objects().size());
2333 for (const SLAPrintObject* print_object : sla_print->objects()) {
2334 SLASupportState state;
2335 for (size_t istep = 0; istep < sla_steps.size(); ++istep) {
2336 state.step[istep] = print_object->step_state_with_timestamp(sla_steps[istep]);
2337 if (state.step[istep].state == PrintStateBase::State::Done) {
2338 std::shared_ptr<const indexed_triangle_set> m = print_object->get_mesh_to_print();
2339 if (m == nullptr || m->empty())
2340 // Consider the DONE step without a valid mesh as invalid for the purpose
2341 // of mesh visualization.
2342 state.step[istep].state = PrintStateBase::State::Invalidated;
2343 else {
2344 for (const ModelInstance* model_instance : print_object->model_object()->instances) {
2345 // Only the instances, which are currently printable, will have the SLA support structures kept.
2346 // The instances outside the print bed will have the GLVolumes of their support structures released.
2347 if (model_instance->is_printable())
2348 aux_volume_state.emplace_back(state.step[istep].timestamp, model_instance->id());
2349 }
2350 }
2351 }
2352 }
2353 sla_support_state.emplace_back(state);
2354 }
2355 }
2356
2357 std::sort(model_volume_state.begin(), model_volume_state.end(), model_volume_state_lower);
2358 std::sort(aux_volume_state.begin(), aux_volume_state.end(), model_volume_state_lower);
2359 // Release all ModelVolume based GLVolumes not found in the current Model. Find the GLVolume of a hollowed mesh.
2360 for (size_t volume_id = 0; volume_id < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++volume_id) {
2361 GLVolume* volume = m_volumes.volumes[volume_id];
2362 ModelVolumeState key(volume);
2363 ModelVolumeState* mvs = nullptr;
2364 if (volume->volume_idx() < 0) {
2365 auto it = std::lower_bound(aux_volume_state.begin(), aux_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2366 if (it != aux_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id)
2367 // This can be an SLA support structure that should not be rendered (in case someone used undo
2368 // to revert to before it was generated). We only reuse the volume if that's not the case.
2369 if (m_model->objects[volume->composite_id.object_id]->sla_points_status != sla::PointsStatus::NoPoints)
2370 mvs = &(*it);
2371 }
2372 else {
2373 auto it = std::lower_bound(model_volume_state.begin(), model_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2374 if (it != model_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id)
2375 mvs = &(*it);
2376 }
2377 // Emplace instance ID of the volume. Both the aux volumes and model volumes share the same instance ID.
2378 // The wipe tower has its own wipe_tower_instance_id().
2379 if (m_selection.contains_volume(volume_id))
2380 instance_ids_selected.emplace_back(volume->geometry_id.second);
2381 if (mvs == nullptr || force_full_scene_refresh) {
2382 // This GLVolume will be released.
2383 if (volume->is_wipe_tower) {
2384 // There is only one wipe tower.
2385 assert(volume_idx_wipe_tower_old == -1);
2386#if ENABLE_OPENGL_ES
2387 m_wipe_tower_mesh.clear();
2388#endif // ENABLE_OPENGL_ES
2389 volume_idx_wipe_tower_old = (int)volume_id;
2390 }
2391 if (!m_reload_delayed) {
2392 deleted_volumes.emplace_back(volume, volume_id);
2393 delete volume;
2394 }
2395 }
2396 else {
2397 // This GLVolume will be reused.
2398 volume->set_sla_shift_z(0.0);
2399 map_glvolume_old_to_new[volume_id] = glvolumes_new.size();
2400 mvs->volume_idx = glvolumes_new.size();
2401 glvolumes_new.emplace_back(volume);
2402 // Update color of the volume based on the current extruder.
2403 if (mvs->model_volume != nullptr) {
2404 int extruder_id = mvs->model_volume->extruder_id();
2405 if (extruder_id != -1)
2406 volume->extruder_id = extruder_id;
2407
2408 volume->is_modifier = !mvs->model_volume->is_model_part();
2409 volume->set_color(color_from_model_volume(*mvs->model_volume));
2410 // force update of render_color alpha channel
2411 volume->set_render_color(volume->color.is_transparent());
2412
2413 // updates volumes transformations
2414 volume->set_instance_transformation(mvs->model_volume->get_object()->instances[mvs->composite_id.instance_id]->get_transformation());
2415 volume->set_volume_transformation(mvs->model_volume->get_transformation());
2416
2417 // updates volumes convex hull
2418 if (mvs->model_volume->is_model_part() && ! volume->convex_hull())
2419 // Model volume was likely changed from modifier or support blocker / enforcer to a model part.
2420 // Only model parts require convex hulls.
2421 volume->set_convex_hull(mvs->model_volume->get_convex_hull_shared_ptr());
2422 }
2423 }
2424 }
2425 sort_remove_duplicates(instance_ids_selected);
2426 auto deleted_volumes_lower = [](const GLVolumeState &v1, const GLVolumeState &v2) { return v1.composite_id < v2.composite_id; };
2427 std::sort(deleted_volumes.begin(), deleted_volumes.end(), deleted_volumes_lower);
2428
2429 if (m_reload_delayed)
2430 return;
2431
2432 bool update_object_list = false;
2433 if (m_volumes.volumes != glvolumes_new)
2434 update_object_list = true;
2435 m_volumes.volumes = std::move(glvolumes_new);
2436 for (unsigned int obj_idx = 0; obj_idx < (unsigned int)m_model->objects.size(); ++ obj_idx) {
2437 const ModelObject &model_object = *m_model->objects[obj_idx];
2438 for (int volume_idx = 0; volume_idx < (int)model_object.volumes.size(); ++ volume_idx) {
2439 const ModelVolume &model_volume = *model_object.volumes[volume_idx];
2440 for (int instance_idx = 0; instance_idx < (int)model_object.instances.size(); ++ instance_idx) {
2441 const ModelInstance &model_instance = *model_object.instances[instance_idx];
2442 ModelVolumeState key(model_volume.id(), model_instance.id());
2443 auto it = std::lower_bound(model_volume_state.begin(), model_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2444 assert(it != model_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id);
2445 if (it->new_geometry()) {
2446 // New volume.
2447 auto it_old_volume = std::lower_bound(deleted_volumes.begin(), deleted_volumes.end(), GLVolumeState(it->composite_id), deleted_volumes_lower);
2448 if (it_old_volume != deleted_volumes.end() && it_old_volume->composite_id == it->composite_id)
2449 // If a volume changed its ObjectID, but it reuses a GLVolume's CompositeID, maintain its selection.
2450 map_glvolume_old_to_new[it_old_volume->volume_idx] = m_volumes.volumes.size();
2451 // Note the index of the loaded volume, so that we can reload the main model GLVolume with the hollowed mesh
2452 // later in this function.
2453 it->volume_idx = m_volumes.volumes.size();
2454 m_volumes.load_object_volume(&model_object, obj_idx, volume_idx, instance_idx);
2455 m_volumes.volumes.back()->geometry_id = key.geometry_id;
2456 update_object_list = true;
2457 }
2458 else {
2459 // Recycling an old GLVolume.
2460 GLVolume &existing_volume = *m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx];
2461 assert(existing_volume.geometry_id == key.geometry_id);
2462 // Update the Object/Volume/Instance indices into the current Model.
2463 if (existing_volume.composite_id != it->composite_id) {
2464 new_to_old_ids_map.push_back(std::make_pair(it->composite_id, existing_volume.composite_id));
2465 existing_volume.composite_id = it->composite_id;
2466 update_object_list = true;
2467 }
2468 }
2469 }
2470 }
2471 }
2472
2473 if (printer_technology == ptSLA) {
2474 size_t idx = 0;
2475 const SLAPrint *sla_print = this->sla_print();
2476 std::vector<double> shift_zs(m_model->objects.size(), 0);
2477 double relative_correction_z = sla_print->relative_correction().z();
2478 if (relative_correction_z <= EPSILON)
2479 relative_correction_z = 1.;
2480 for (const SLAPrintObject *print_object : sla_print->objects()) {
2481 SLASupportState &state = sla_support_state[idx ++];
2482 const ModelObject *model_object = print_object->model_object();
2483 // Find an index of the ModelObject
2484 int object_idx;
2485 // There may be new SLA volumes added to the scene for this print_object.
2486 // Find the object index of this print_object in the Model::objects list.
2487 auto it = std::find(sla_print->model().objects.begin(), sla_print->model().objects.end(), model_object);
2488 assert(it != sla_print->model().objects.end());
2489 object_idx = it - sla_print->model().objects.begin();
2490 // Cache the Z offset to be applied to all volumes with this object_idx.
2491 shift_zs[object_idx] = print_object->get_current_elevation() / relative_correction_z;
2492 // Collect indices of this print_object's instances, for which the SLA support meshes are to be added to the scene.
2493 // pairs of <instance_idx, print_instance_idx>
2494 std::vector<std::pair<size_t, size_t>> instances[std::tuple_size<SLASteps>::value];
2495 for (size_t print_instance_idx = 0; print_instance_idx < print_object->instances().size(); ++ print_instance_idx) {
2496 const SLAPrintObject::Instance &instance = print_object->instances()[print_instance_idx];
2497 // Find index of ModelInstance corresponding to this SLAPrintObject::Instance.
2498 auto it = std::find_if(model_object->instances.begin(), model_object->instances.end(),
2499 [&instance](const ModelInstance *mi) { return mi->id() == instance.instance_id; });
2500 assert(it != model_object->instances.end());
2501 int instance_idx = it - model_object->instances.begin();
2502 for (size_t istep = 0; istep < sla_steps.size(); ++istep) {
2503 if (state.step[istep].state == PrintStateBase::State::Done) {
2504 // Check whether there is an existing auxiliary volume to be updated, or a new auxiliary volume to be created.
2505 ModelVolumeState key(state.step[istep].timestamp, instance.instance_id.id);
2506 auto it = std::lower_bound(aux_volume_state.begin(), aux_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2507 assert(it != aux_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id);
2508 if (it->new_geometry()) {
2509 // This can be an SLA support structure that should not be rendered (in case someone used undo
2510 // to revert to before it was generated). If that's the case, we should not generate anything.
2511 if (model_object->sla_points_status != sla::PointsStatus::NoPoints)
2512 instances[istep].emplace_back(std::pair<size_t, size_t>(instance_idx, print_instance_idx));
2513 else
2514 shift_zs[object_idx] = 0.;
2515 }
2516 else {
2517 // Recycling an old GLVolume. Update the Object/Instance indices into the current Model.
2518 const GLVolume::CompositeID new_id(object_idx, m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx]->volume_idx(), instance_idx);
2519 new_to_old_ids_map.push_back(std::make_pair(new_id, m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx]->composite_id));
2520 m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx]->composite_id = new_id;
2521 m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx]->set_instance_transformation(model_object->instances[instance_idx]->get_transformation());
2522 }
2523 }
2524 }
2525 }
2526
2527 for (size_t istep = 0; istep < sla_steps.size(); ++istep) {
2528 if (!instances[istep].empty())
2529 m_volumes.load_object_auxiliary(print_object, object_idx, instances[istep], sla_steps[istep], state.step[istep].timestamp);
2530 }
2531 }
2532
2533 // Shift-up all volumes of the object so that it has the right elevation with respect to the print bed
2534 for (GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes) {
2535 const ModelObject* model_object = (volume->object_idx() < (int)m_model->objects.size()) ? m_model->objects[volume->object_idx()] : nullptr;
2536 if (model_object != nullptr && model_object->instances[volume->instance_idx()]->is_printable()) {
2537 const SLAPrintObject* po = sla_print->get_print_object_by_model_object_id(model_object->id());
2538 if (po != nullptr)
2539 volume->set_sla_shift_z(po->get_current_elevation() / sla_print->relative_correction().z());
2540 }
2541 }
2542 }
2543
2544 if (printer_technology == ptFFF && m_config->has("nozzle_diameter")) {
2545 // Should the wipe tower be visualized ?
2546 unsigned int extruders_count = (unsigned int)dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloats*>(m_config->option("nozzle_diameter"))->values.size();
2547
2548 const bool wt = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionBool*>(m_config->option("wipe_tower"))->value;
2549 const bool co = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionBool*>(m_config->option("complete_objects"))->value;
2550
2551 if (extruders_count > 1 && wt && !co) {
2552
2553 const float x = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("wipe_tower_x"))->value;
2554 const float y = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("wipe_tower_y"))->value;
2555 const float w = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("wipe_tower_width"))->value;
2556 const float a = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("wipe_tower_rotation_angle"))->value;
2557 const float bw = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("wipe_tower_brim_width"))->value;
2558 const float ca = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("wipe_tower_cone_angle"))->value;
2559
2560 const Print *print = m_process->fff_print();
2561 const float depth = print->wipe_tower_data(extruders_count).depth;
2562 const std::vector<std::pair<float, float>> z_and_depth_pairs = print->wipe_tower_data(extruders_count).z_and_depth_pairs;
2563 const float height_real = print->wipe_tower_data(extruders_count).height; // -1.f = unknown
2564
2565 // Height of a print (Show at least a slab).
2566 const double height = height_real < 0.f ? std::max(m_model->max_z(), 10.0) : height_real;
2567
2568 if (depth != 0.) {
2569 #if ENABLE_OPENGL_ES
2570 int volume_idx_wipe_tower_new = m_volumes.load_wipe_tower_preview(
2571 x, y, w, depth, z_and_depth_pairs, (float)height, ca, a, !print->is_step_done(psWipeTower),
2572 bw, &m_wipe_tower_mesh);
2573 #else
2574 int volume_idx_wipe_tower_new = m_volumes.load_wipe_tower_preview(
2575 x, y, w, depth, z_and_depth_pairs, (float)height, ca, a, !print->is_step_done(psWipeTower),
2576 bw);
2577 #endif // ENABLE_OPENGL_ES
2578 if (volume_idx_wipe_tower_old != -1)
2579 map_glvolume_old_to_new[volume_idx_wipe_tower_old] = volume_idx_wipe_tower_new;
2580 }
2581 }
2582 }
2583
2584 update_volumes_colors_by_extruder();
2585 // Update selection indices based on the old/new GLVolumeCollection.
2586 if (m_selection.get_mode() == Selection::Instance)
2587 m_selection.instances_changed(instance_ids_selected);
2588 else
2589 m_selection.volumes_changed(map_glvolume_old_to_new);
2590
2591 if (printer_technology == ptSLA) {
2592 std::sort(new_to_old_ids_map.begin(), new_to_old_ids_map.end(),
2593 [](const std::pair<GLVolume::CompositeID, GLVolume::CompositeID>& i1, const std::pair<GLVolume::CompositeID, GLVolume::CompositeID>& i2) {
2594 return i1.first.object_id < i2.first.object_id || (i1.first.object_id == i2.first.object_id && i1.first.instance_id < i2.first.instance_id); });
2595
2596 new_to_old_ids_map.erase(std::unique(new_to_old_ids_map.begin(), new_to_old_ids_map.end(),
2597 [](const std::pair<GLVolume::CompositeID, GLVolume::CompositeID>& i1, const std::pair<GLVolume::CompositeID, GLVolume::CompositeID>& i2) {
2598 return composite_id_match(i1.first, i2.first); }), new_to_old_ids_map.end());
2599
2600 m_sla_view.update_instances_cache(new_to_old_ids_map);
2601 if (m_sla_view_type_detection_active) {
2602 m_sla_view.detect_type_from_volumes(m_volumes.volumes);
2603 m_sla_view_type_detection_active = false;
2604 }
2605 m_sla_view.update_volumes_visibility(m_volumes.volumes);
2606 update_object_list = true;
2607 }
2608
2609 m_gizmos.update_data();
2610 m_gizmos.refresh_on_off_state();
2611
2612 // Update the toolbar
2613 if (update_object_list)
2614 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_OBJECT_SELECT));
2615
2616 // checks for geometry outside the print volume to render it accordingly
2617 if (!m_volumes.empty()) {
2618 ModelInstanceEPrintVolumeState state;
2619 const bool contained_min_one = check_volumes_outside_state(m_bed.build_volume(), &state, !force_full_scene_refresh);
2620 const bool partlyOut = (state == ModelInstanceEPrintVolumeState::ModelInstancePVS_Partly_Outside);
2621 const bool fullyOut = (state == ModelInstanceEPrintVolumeState::ModelInstancePVS_Fully_Outside);
2622
2623 if (printer_technology != ptSLA) {
2624 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectClashed, partlyOut);
2625 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectOutside, fullyOut);
2626 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SlaSupportsOutside, false);
2627 }
2628 else {
2629 const auto [res, volume] = _is_any_volume_outside();
2630 const bool is_support = volume != nullptr && volume->is_sla_support();
2631 if (is_support) {
2632 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectClashed, false);
2633 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectOutside, false);
2634 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SlaSupportsOutside, partlyOut || fullyOut);
2635 }
2636 else {
2637 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectClashed, partlyOut);
2638 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectOutside, fullyOut);
2639 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SlaSupportsOutside, false);
2640 }
2641 }
2642
2643 post_event(Event<bool>(EVT_GLCANVAS_ENABLE_ACTION_BUTTONS,
2644 contained_min_one && !m_model->objects.empty() && !partlyOut));
2645 }
2646 else {
2647 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectOutside, false);
2648 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectClashed, false);
2649 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SlaSupportsOutside, false);
2650 post_event(Event<bool>(EVT_GLCANVAS_ENABLE_ACTION_BUTTONS, false));
2651 }
2652
2653 refresh_camera_scene_box();
2654
2655 if (m_selection.is_empty()) {
2656 // If no object is selected, deactivate the active gizmo, if any
2657 // Otherwise it may be shown after cleaning the scene (if it was active while the objects were deleted)
2658 m_gizmos.reset_all_states();
2659
2660 // If no object is selected, reset the objects manipulator on the sidebar
2661 // to force a reset of its cache
2662 auto manip = wxGetApp().obj_manipul();
2663 if (manip != nullptr)
2664 manip->set_dirty();
2665 }
2666
2667 // refresh volume raycasters for picking
2668 m_scene_raycaster.remove_raycasters(SceneRaycaster::EType::Volume);
2669 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++i) {
2670 const GLVolume* v = m_volumes.volumes[i];
2671 assert(v->mesh_raycaster != nullptr);
2672 std::shared_ptr<SceneRaycasterItem> raycaster = add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Volume, i, *v->mesh_raycaster, v->world_matrix());
2673 raycaster->set_active(v->is_active);
2674 }
2675
2676 for (GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes)
2677 if (volume->object_idx() < (int)m_model->objects.size() && m_model->objects[volume->object_idx()]->instances[volume->instance_idx()]->is_printable()) {
2678 if (volume->is_modifier && m_model->objects[volume->object_idx()]->volumes[volume->volume_idx()]->is_modifier())
2679 volume->is_active = printer_technology != ptSLA;
2680 }
2681
2682 // refresh gizmo elements raycasters for picking
2683 GLGizmoBase* curr_gizmo = m_gizmos.get_current();
2684 if (curr_gizmo != nullptr)
2685 curr_gizmo->unregister_raycasters_for_picking();
2686 m_scene_raycaster.remove_raycasters(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo);
2687 if (curr_gizmo != nullptr && !m_selection.is_empty())
2688 curr_gizmo->register_raycasters_for_picking();
2689
2690 // and force this canvas to be redrawn.
2691 m_dirty = true;
2692}

◆ render()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::render ( )
1881{
1882 if (m_in_render) {
1883 // if called recursively, return
1884 m_dirty = true;
1885 return;
1886 }
1887
1888 m_in_render = true;
1889 Slic3r::ScopeGuard in_render_guard([this]() { m_in_render = false; });
1890 (void)in_render_guard;
1891
1892 if (m_canvas == nullptr)
1893 return;
1894
1895 // ensures this canvas is current and initialized
1896 if (!_is_shown_on_screen() || !_set_current() || !wxGetApp().init_opengl())
1897 return;
1898
1899 if (!is_initialized() && !init())
1900 return;
1901
1902 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled())
1903 m_gcode_viewer.init();
1904
1905 if (! m_bed.build_volume().valid()) {
1906 // this happens at startup when no data is still saved under <>\AppData\Roaming\Slic3rPE
1907 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_UPDATE_BED_SHAPE));
1908 return;
1909 }
1910
1911#if ENABLE_ENVIRONMENT_MAP
1912 if (wxGetApp().is_editor())
1913 wxGetApp().plater()->init_environment_texture();
1914#endif // ENABLE_ENVIRONMENT_MAP
1915
1916#if ENABLE_GLMODEL_STATISTICS
1917 GLModel::reset_statistics_counters();
1918#endif // ENABLE_GLMODEL_STATISTICS
1919
1920 const Size& cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
1921 // Probably due to different order of events on Linux/GTK2, when one switched from 3D scene
1922 // to preview, this was called before canvas had its final size. It reported zero width
1923 // and the viewport was set incorrectly, leading to tripping glAsserts further down
1924 // the road (in apply_projection). That's why the minimum size is forced to 10.
1925 Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
1926 camera.set_viewport(0, 0, std::max(10u, (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width()), std::max(10u, (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height()));
1927 camera.apply_viewport();
1928
1929 if (camera.requires_zoom_to_bed) {
1930 zoom_to_bed();
1931 _resize((unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width(), (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height());
1932 camera.requires_zoom_to_bed = false;
1933 }
1934
1935 camera.apply_projection(_max_bounding_box(true, true));
1936
1937 wxGetApp().imgui()->new_frame();
1938
1939 if (m_picking_enabled) {
1940 if (m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging() && !m_rectangle_selection.is_empty())
1941 // picking pass using rectangle selection
1942 _rectangular_selection_picking_pass();
1943 else if (!m_volumes.empty())
1944 // regular picking pass
1945 _picking_pass();
1946#if ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
1947 else {
1948 ImGuiWrapper& imgui = *wxGetApp().imgui();
1949 imgui.begin(std::string("Hit result"), ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize);
1950 imgui.text("Picking disabled");
1951 imgui.end();
1952 }
1953#endif // ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
1954 }
1955
1956#ifdef SHOW_IMGUI_DEMO_WINDOW
1957 if (show_imgui_demo_window) ImGui::ShowDemoWindow();
1958#endif // SHOW_IMGUI_DEMO_WINDOW
1959
1960 const bool is_looking_downward = camera.is_looking_downward();
1961
1962 // draw scene
1963 glsafe(::glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
1964 _render_background();
1965
1966 _render_objects(GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Opaque);
1967 _render_sla_slices();
1968 _render_selection();
1969 _render_bed_axes();
1970 if (is_looking_downward)
1971 _render_bed(camera.get_view_matrix(), camera.get_projection_matrix(), false);
1972 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled())
1973 _render_gcode();
1974 _render_objects(GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Transparent);
1975
1976 _render_sequential_clearance();
1977#if ENABLE_RENDER_SELECTION_CENTER
1978 _render_selection_center();
1979#endif // ENABLE_RENDER_SELECTION_CENTER
1980 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled())
1981 _render_gcode_cog();
1982
1983 // we need to set the mouse's scene position here because the depth buffer
1984 // could be invalidated by the following gizmo render methods
1985 // this position is used later into on_mouse() to drag the objects
1986 if (m_picking_enabled)
1987 m_mouse.scene_position = _mouse_to_3d(m_mouse.position.cast<coord_t>());
1988
1989 // sidebar hints need to be rendered before the gizmos because the depth buffer
1990 // could be invalidated by the following gizmo render methods
1991 _render_selection_sidebar_hints();
1992 _render_current_gizmo();
1993 if (!is_looking_downward)
1994 _render_bed(camera.get_view_matrix(), camera.get_projection_matrix(), true);
1995
1996#if ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
1997 if (m_picking_enabled && !m_mouse.dragging && !m_gizmos.is_dragging() && !m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging())
1998 m_scene_raycaster.render_hit(camera);
1999#endif // ENABLE_RAYCAST_PICKING_DEBUG
2000
2001#if ENABLE_SHOW_CAMERA_TARGET
2002 _render_camera_target();
2003#endif // ENABLE_SHOW_CAMERA_TARGET
2004
2005 if (m_picking_enabled && m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging())
2006 m_rectangle_selection.render(*this);
2007
2008 // draw overlays
2009 _render_overlays();
2010
2011 if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_render_statistic_dialog_visible()) {
2012 ImGuiWrapper& imgui = *wxGetApp().imgui();
2013 imgui.begin(std::string("Render statistics"), ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse);
2014 imgui.text("FPS (SwapBuffers() calls per second):");
2015 ImGui::SameLine();
2016 imgui.text(std::to_string(m_render_stats.get_fps_and_reset_if_needed()));
2017 ImGui::Separator();
2018 imgui.text("Compressed textures:");
2019 ImGui::SameLine();
2020 imgui.text(OpenGLManager::are_compressed_textures_supported() ? "supported" : "not supported");
2021 imgui.text("Max texture size:");
2022 ImGui::SameLine();
2023 imgui.text(std::to_string(OpenGLManager::get_gl_info().get_max_tex_size()));
2024 imgui.end();
2025 }
2026
2027#if ENABLE_PROJECT_DIRTY_STATE_DEBUG_WINDOW
2028 if (wxGetApp().is_editor() && wxGetApp().plater()->is_view3D_shown())
2029 wxGetApp().plater()->render_project_state_debug_window();
2030#endif // ENABLE_PROJECT_DIRTY_STATE_DEBUG_WINDOW
2031
2032#if ENABLE_CAMERA_STATISTICS
2033 camera.debug_render();
2034#endif // ENABLE_CAMERA_STATISTICS
2035#if ENABLE_GLMODEL_STATISTICS
2036 GLModel::render_statistics();
2037#endif // ENABLE_GLMODEL_STATISTICS
2038#if ENABLE_OBJECT_MANIPULATION_DEBUG
2039 wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->render_debug_window();
2040#endif // ENABLE_OBJECT_MANIPULATION_DEBUG
2041
2042 if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_view3D_shown() && current_printer_technology() == ptSLA) {
2043 const GLGizmosManager::EType type = m_gizmos.get_current_type();
2044 if (type == GLGizmosManager::EType::Undefined)
2045 m_sla_view.render_switch_button();
2046#if ENABLE_SLA_VIEW_DEBUG_WINDOW
2047 m_sla_view.render_debug_window();
2048#endif // ENABLE_SLA_VIEW_DEBUG_WINDOW
2049 }
2050
2051 std::string tooltip;
2052
2053 // Negative coordinate means out of the window, likely because the window was deactivated.
2054 // In that case the tooltip should be hidden.
2055 if (m_mouse.position.x() >= 0. && m_mouse.position.y() >= 0.) {
2056 if (tooltip.empty())
2057 tooltip = m_layers_editing.get_tooltip(*this);
2058
2059 if (tooltip.empty())
2060 tooltip = m_gizmos.get_tooltip();
2061
2062 if (tooltip.empty())
2063 tooltip = m_main_toolbar.get_tooltip();
2064
2065 if (tooltip.empty())
2066 tooltip = m_undoredo_toolbar.get_tooltip();
2067
2068 if (tooltip.empty())
2069 tooltip = wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar().get_tooltip();
2070
2071 if (tooltip.empty())
2072 tooltip = wxGetApp().plater()->get_view_toolbar().get_tooltip();
2073 }
2074
2075 set_tooltip(tooltip);
2076
2077 if (m_tooltip_enabled)
2078 m_tooltip.render(m_mouse.position, *this);
2079
2080 wxGetApp().plater()->get_mouse3d_controller().render_settings_dialog(*this);
2081
2082 wxGetApp().plater()->get_notification_manager()->render_notifications(*this, get_overlay_window_width());
2083
2084 wxGetApp().imgui()->render();
2085
2086 m_canvas->SwapBuffers();
2087 m_render_stats.increment_fps_counter();
2088}

◆ schedule_extra_frame()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::schedule_extra_frame ( int  miliseconds)
3408{
3409 // Schedule idle event right now
3410 if (miliseconds == 0)
3411 {
3412 // We want to wakeup idle evnt but most likely this is call inside render cycle so we need to wait
3413 if (m_in_render)
3414 miliseconds = 33;
3415 else {
3416 m_dirty = true;
3417 wxWakeUpIdle();
3418 return;
3419 }
3420 }
3421 int remaining_time = m_render_timer.GetInterval();
3422 // Timer is not running
3423 if (!m_render_timer.IsRunning()) {
3424 m_render_timer.StartOnce(miliseconds);
3425 // Timer is running - restart only if new period is shorter than remaning period
3426 } else {
3427 if (miliseconds + 20 < remaining_time) {
3428 m_render_timer.Stop();
3429 m_render_timer.StartOnce(miliseconds);
3430 }
3431 }
3432}

References m_dirty, m_in_render, and m_render_timer.

Referenced by Slic3r::GUI::NotificationManager::push_notification_data(), Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoSimplify::request_rerender(), and Slic3r::GUI::NotificationManager::update_notifications().

◆ timestamp_now()

static int64_t Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::timestamp_now ( )
inlinestatic
967 {
968#ifdef _WIN32
969 // Cheaper on Windows, calls GetSystemTimeAsFileTime()
970 return wxGetUTCTimeMillis().GetValue();
971#else
972 // calls clock()
973 return wxGetLocalTimeMillis().GetValue();
974#endif
975 }

◆ toggle_model_objects_visibility()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::toggle_model_objects_visibility ( bool  visible,
const ModelObject *  mo = nullptr,
int  instance_idx = -1,
const ModelVolume *  mv = nullptr 
)
1634{
1635 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<SceneRaycasterItem>>* raycasters = get_raycasters_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Volume);
1636 for (GLVolume* vol : m_volumes.volumes) {
1637 if (vol->is_wipe_tower)
1638 vol->is_active = (visible && mo == nullptr);
1639 else {
1640 if ((mo == nullptr || m_model->objects[vol->composite_id.object_id] == mo)
1641 && (instance_idx == -1 || vol->composite_id.instance_id == instance_idx)
1642 && (mv == nullptr || m_model->objects[vol->composite_id.object_id]->volumes[vol->composite_id.volume_id] == mv)) {
1643 vol->is_active = visible;
1644 if (!vol->is_modifier)
1645 vol->color.a(1.f);
1646
1647 if (instance_idx == -1) {
1648 vol->force_native_color = false;
1649 vol->force_neutral_color = false;
1650 } else {
1651 const GLGizmosManager& gm = get_gizmos_manager();
1652 auto gizmo_type = gm.get_current_type();
1653 if ( (gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::FdmSupports
1654 || gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::Seam
1655 || gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::Cut)
1656 && !vol->is_modifier) {
1657 vol->force_neutral_color = true;
1658 }
1659 else if (gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::MmuSegmentation)
1660 vol->is_active = false;
1661 else
1662 vol->force_native_color = true;
1663 }
1664 }
1665 }
1666
1667 auto it = std::find_if(raycasters->begin(), raycasters->end(), [vol](std::shared_ptr<SceneRaycasterItem> item) { return item->get_raycaster() == vol->mesh_raycaster.get(); });
1668 if (it != raycasters->end())
1669 (*it)->set_active(vol->is_active);
1670 }
1671
1672 if (visible && !mo)
1673 toggle_sla_auxiliaries_visibility(true, mo, instance_idx);
1674
1675 if (!mo && !visible && !m_model->objects.empty() && (m_model->objects.size() > 1 || m_model->objects.front()->instances.size() > 1))
1676 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SomethingNotShown, true);
1677
1678 if (!mo && visible)
1679 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SomethingNotShown, false);
1680}
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::toggle_sla_auxiliaries_visibility
void toggle_sla_auxiliaries_visibility(bool visible, const ModelObject *mo=nullptr, int instance_idx=-1)
Definition GLCanvas3D.cpp:1612

◆ toggle_sla_auxiliaries_visibility()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::toggle_sla_auxiliaries_visibility ( bool  visible,
const ModelObject *  mo = nullptr,
int  instance_idx = -1 
)
1613{
1614 if (current_printer_technology() != ptSLA)
1615 return;
1616
1617 m_render_sla_auxiliaries = visible;
1618
1619 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<SceneRaycasterItem>>* raycasters = get_raycasters_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Volume);
1620
1621 for (GLVolume* vol : m_volumes.volumes) {
1622 if ((mo == nullptr || m_model->objects[vol->composite_id.object_id] == mo)
1623 && (instance_idx == -1 || vol->composite_id.instance_id == instance_idx)
1624 && vol->composite_id.volume_id < 0) {
1625 vol->is_active = visible;
1626 auto it = std::find_if(raycasters->begin(), raycasters->end(), [vol](std::shared_ptr<SceneRaycasterItem> item) { return item->get_raycaster() == vol->mesh_raycaster.get(); });
1627 if (it != raycasters->end())
1628 (*it)->set_active(vol->is_active);
1629 }
1630 }
1631}

References current_printer_technology(), get_raycasters_for_picking(), m_model, m_render_sla_auxiliaries, m_volumes, Slic3r::Model::objects, Slic3r::ptSLA, Slic3r::GUI::SceneRaycaster::Volume, and Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::volumes.

◆ unbind_event_handlers()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::unbind_event_handlers ( )
2785{

2787 m_canvas->Unbind(wxEVT_SIZE, &GLCanvas3D::on_size, this);

2803 m_canvas->Unbind(wxEVT_LEAVE_WINDOW, &GLCanvas3D::on_mouse, this);

◆ update_instance_printable_state_for_object()

◆ update_sequential_clearance()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::update_sequential_clearance ( bool  force_contours_generation)
4539{
4540 if (current_printer_technology() != ptFFF || !fff_print()->config().complete_objects)
4541 return;
4542
4543 if (m_layers_editing.is_enabled())
4544 return;
4545
4546 auto instance_transform_from_volumes = [this](int object_idx, int instance_idx) {
4547 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
4548 if (v->object_idx() == object_idx && v->instance_idx() == instance_idx)
4549 return v->get_instance_transformation();
4550 }
4551 assert(false);
4552 return Geometry::Transformation();
4553 };
4554
4555 auto is_object_outside_printbed = [this](int object_idx) {
4556 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
4557 if (v->object_idx() == object_idx && v->is_outside)
4558 return true;
4559 }
4560 return false;
4561 };
4562
4563 // collects instance transformations from volumes
4564 // first: define temporary cache
4565 unsigned int instances_count = 0;
4566 std::vector<std::vector<std::optional<Geometry::Transformation>>> instance_transforms;
4567 for (size_t obj = 0; obj < m_model->objects.size(); ++obj) {
4568 instance_transforms.emplace_back(std::vector<std::optional<Geometry::Transformation>>());
4569 const ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[obj];
4570 for (size_t i = 0; i < model_object->instances.size(); ++i) {
4571 instance_transforms[obj].emplace_back(std::optional<Geometry::Transformation>());
4572 ++instances_count;
4573 }
4574 }
4575
4576 if (instances_count == 1)
4577 return;
4578
4579 // second: fill temporary cache with data from volumes
4580 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
4581 if (v->is_wipe_tower)
4582 continue;
4583
4584 const int object_idx = v->object_idx();
4585 const int instance_idx = v->instance_idx();
4586 auto& transform = instance_transforms[object_idx][instance_idx];
4587 if (!transform.has_value())
4588 transform = instance_transform_from_volumes(object_idx, instance_idx);
4589 }
4590
4591 // helper function to calculate the transformation to be applied to the sequential print clearance contours
4592 auto instance_trafo = [](const Transform3d& hull_trafo, const Geometry::Transformation& inst_trafo) {
4593 Vec3d offset = inst_trafo.get_offset() - hull_trafo.translation();
4594 offset.z() = 0.0;
4595 return Geometry::translation_transform(offset) *
4596 Geometry::rotation_transform(Geometry::rotation_diff_z(hull_trafo, inst_trafo.get_matrix()) * Vec3d::UnitZ());
4597 };
4598
4599 // calculates objects 2d hulls (see also: Print::sequential_print_horizontal_clearance_valid())
4600 // this is done only the first time this method is called while moving the mouse,
4601 // the results are then cached for following displacements
4602 if (force_contours_generation || m_sequential_print_clearance_first_displacement) {
4603 m_sequential_print_clearance.m_evaluating = false;
4604 m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hulls_2d_cache.clear();
4605 const float shrink_factor = static_cast<float>(scale_(0.5 * fff_print()->config().extruder_clearance_radius.value - EPSILON));
4606 const double mitter_limit = scale_(0.1);
4607 m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hulls_2d_cache.reserve(m_model->objects.size());
4608 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_model->objects.size(); ++i) {
4609 ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[i];
4610 Geometry::Transformation trafo = instance_transform_from_volumes((int)i, 0);
4611 trafo.set_offset({ 0.0, 0.0, trafo.get_offset().z() });
4612 Pointf3s& new_hull_2d = m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hulls_2d_cache.emplace_back(std::make_pair(Pointf3s(), trafo.get_matrix())).first;
4613 if (is_object_outside_printbed((int)i))
4614 continue;
4615
4616 Polygon hull_2d = model_object->convex_hull_2d(trafo.get_matrix());
4617 if (!hull_2d.empty()) {
4618 // Shrink the extruder_clearance_radius a tiny bit, so that if the object arrangement algorithm placed the objects
4619 // exactly by satisfying the extruder_clearance_radius, this test will not trigger collision.
4620 const Polygons offset_res = offset(hull_2d, shrink_factor, jtRound, mitter_limit);
4621 if (!offset_res.empty())
4622 hull_2d = offset_res.front();
4623 }
4624
4625 new_hull_2d.reserve(hull_2d.points.size());
4626 for (const Point& p : hull_2d.points) {
4627 new_hull_2d.emplace_back(Vec3d(unscale<double>(p.x()), unscale<double>(p.y()), 0.0));
4628 }
4629 }
4630
4631 ContoursList contours;
4632 contours.contours.reserve(instance_transforms.size());
4633 contours.trafos = std::vector<std::pair<size_t, Transform3d>>();
4634 (*contours.trafos).reserve(instances_count);
4635 for (size_t i = 0; i < instance_transforms.size(); ++i) {
4636 const auto& [hull, hull_trafo] = m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hulls_2d_cache[i];
4637 Points hull_pts;
4638 hull_pts.reserve(hull.size());
4639 for (size_t j = 0; j < hull.size(); ++j) {
4640 hull_pts.emplace_back(scaled<double>(hull[j].x()), scaled<double>(hull[j].y()));
4641 }
4642 contours.contours.emplace_back(Geometry::convex_hull(std::move(hull_pts)));
4643
4644 const auto& instances = instance_transforms[i];
4645 for (const auto& instance : instances) {
4646 (*contours.trafos).emplace_back(i, instance_trafo(hull_trafo, *instance));
4647 }
4648 }
4649
4650 set_sequential_print_clearance_contours(contours, false);
4651 m_sequential_print_clearance_first_displacement = false;
4652 }
4653 else {
4654 if (!m_sequential_print_clearance.empty()) {
4655 std::vector<Transform3d> trafos;
4656 trafos.reserve(instances_count);
4657 for (size_t i = 0; i < instance_transforms.size(); ++i) {
4658 const auto& [hull, hull_trafo] = m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hulls_2d_cache[i];
4659 const auto& instances = instance_transforms[i];
4660 for (const auto& instance : instances) {
4661 trafos.emplace_back(instance_trafo(hull_trafo, *instance));
4662 }
4663 }
4664 m_sequential_print_clearance.update_instances_trafos(trafos);
4665 }
4666 }
4667}
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::SequentialPrintClearance::update_instances_trafos
void update_instances_trafos(const std::vector< Transform3d > &trafos)
Definition GLCanvas3D.cpp:939
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::SequentialPrintClearance::m_hulls_2d_cache
std::vector< std::pair< Pointf3s, Transform3d > > m_hulls_2d_cache
Definition GLCanvas3D.hpp:645
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::set_sequential_print_clearance_contours
void set_sequential_print_clearance_contours(const ContoursList &contours, bool generate_fill)
Definition GLCanvas3D.hpp:982
scale_
#define scale_(val)
Definition libslic3r.h:69
Slic3r::Geometry::convex_hull
Polygon convex_hull(Points pts)
Definition ConvexHull.cpp:11
Slic3r::Geometry::rotation_diff_z
double rotation_diff_z(const Transform3d &trafo_from, const Transform3d &trafo_to)
Definition Geometry.cpp:712

std::vector< Polygon, PointsAllocator< Polygon > > Polygons
Definition Polygon.hpp:15

libnest2d::shapelike::reserve

Definition Emboss.cpp:34

References Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::ContoursList::contours, Slic3r::Geometry::convex_hull(), Slic3r::ModelObject::convex_hull_2d(), current_printer_technology(), Slic3r::MultiPoint::empty(), Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::SequentialPrintClearance::empty(), EPSILON, fff_print(), Slic3r::MultiPoint::front(), Slic3r::Geometry::Transformation::get_matrix(), Slic3r::Geometry::Transformation::get_offset(), Slic3r::ModelObject::instances, Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::LayersEditing::is_enabled(), Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::SequentialPrintClearance::m_evaluating, Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::SequentialPrintClearance::m_hulls_2d_cache, m_layers_editing, m_model, m_sequential_print_clearance, m_sequential_print_clearance_first_displacement, m_volumes, Slic3r::Model::objects, Slic3r::offset(), Slic3r::MultiPoint::points, Slic3r::ptFFF, Slic3r::Geometry::rotation_diff_z(), Slic3r::Geometry::rotation_transform(), scale_, Slic3r::Geometry::Transformation::set_offset(), set_sequential_print_clearance_contours(), Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::ContoursList::trafos, Slic3r::transform(), Eigen::Transform< _Scalar, _Dim, _Mode, _Options >::translation(), Slic3r::Geometry::translation_transform(), Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::SequentialPrintClearance::update_instances_trafos(), and Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::volumes.

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::update_ui_from_settings ( )

4431
4432#if __APPLE__
4433 // Update OpenGL scaling on OSX after the user toggled the "use_retina_opengl" settings in Preferences dialog.
4434 const float orig_scaling = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
4435
4436 const bool use_retina = wxGetApp().app_config->get_bool("use_retina_opengl");
4437 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "GLCanvas3D: Use Retina OpenGL: " << use_retina;
4438 m_retina_helper->set_use_retina(use_retina);
4439 const float new_scaling = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();

4442 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "GLCanvas3D: Scaling factor: " << new_scaling;
4443
4444 Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
4445 camera.set_zoom(camera.get_zoom() * new_scaling / orig_scaling);
4446 _refresh_if_shown_on_screen();
4447 }
4448#endif // ENABLE_RETINA_GL

4451 wxGetApp().plater()->enable_collapse_toolbar(wxGetApp().app_config->get_bool("show_collapse_button"));
